I, keep the name of a foul, common Muggle, who abandoned me even before I was born, just because he found out his wife was a witch? No, Harry. I fashioned myself a new name, a name I knew wizards everywhere would one day fear to speak, when I had become the greatest sorcerer in the world!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Tom Riddle's transformation into Lord Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p><b>Tom Marvolo Riddle</b><sup id="cite_ref-COS17_7-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS17-7"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>7<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> (<a href="/wiki/31_December" title="31 December">31 December</a> <a href="/wiki/1926" title="1926">1926</a><sup id="cite_ref-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-18"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>18<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> – <a href="/wiki/2_May" title="2 May">2 May</a> <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>), later known as <b>Lord Voldemort</b> or, alternatively as the <b>Dark Lord</b>, <b>You-Know-Who</b>, <b>He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named</b>, or, just simply <b>Voldemort</b>, was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Half-blood" title="Half-blood">half-blood</a><sup id="cite_ref-blood_3-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-blood-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a> considered to have been the most powerful and dangerous <a href="/wiki/Dark_wizard" title="Dark wizard">Dark wizard</a> of all time.<sup id="cite_ref-PM_19-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PM-19"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>19<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-dangerous_20-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-dangerous-20"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>20<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> He was amongst the greatest wizards to have ever lived, rivalled only by <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF2_21-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF2-21"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>21<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-OOTP23_22-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP23-22"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>22<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-DH27_23-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH27-23"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>23<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Descended from <a href="/wiki/Salazar_Slytherin" title="Salazar Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin</a> on his mother's side, through the <a href="/wiki/House_of_Gaunt" title="House of Gaunt">House of Gaunt</a>, Tom Riddle was conceived whilst his father, <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle_Senior" title="Tom Riddle Senior">Tom Riddle Senior</a>, was under the effects of a <a href="/wiki/Love_potion" title="Love potion">love potion</a> supplied by his mother, <a href="/wiki/Merope_Riddle" title="Merope Riddle">Merope Gaunt</a>. When the enchantment was lifted, Tom's father abandoned his <a href="/wiki/Pregnancy" title="Pregnancy">pregnant</a> wife and returned to <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton" title="Little Hangleton">Little Hangleton</a>. His mother gave birth to him, before dying an hour later. Her only wishes were that he'd look like his <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle_Senior" title="Tom Riddle Senior">father</a>, and that he was named Tom after his father, his middle name <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt" title="Marvolo Gaunt">Marvolo</a> after her father, and that <a href="/wiki/Riddle_family" title="Riddle family">Riddle</a> would be his last name. And with that, Tom Marvolo Riddle was born and raised in the <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a>-run <a href="/wiki/Wool%27s_Orphanage" title="Wool's Orphanage">Wool's Orphanage</a>.  
</p><p>Tom began attending <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a> in <a href="/wiki/1938" title="1938">1938</a> and was immediately sorted into <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> house. During this time, Tom discovered his heritage and adopted <a href="/wiki/Pure-blood_supremacy" title="Pure-blood supremacy">pure-blood supremacist</a> ideals. Tom opened the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> and used its <a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">monster</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Basilisk" title="Basilisk">Basilisk</a>, to attack <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-born</a> students, resulting in the death of <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Myrtle Warren</a>. He began his quest to attain <a href="/wiki/Immortality" title="Immortality">immortality</a> between the years of <a href="/wiki/1943" title="1943">1943</a> and <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, creating his first <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a> at the age of sixteen. While attending Hogwarts, Tom Riddle was made a <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefect</a> in <a href="/wiki/1942" title="1942">1942</a> until his graduation in <a href="/wiki/1945" title="1945">1945</a>.
</p><p>Tom spent several years as a purchasing agent for the Dark artefacts shop <a href="/wiki/Borgin_and_Burkes" title="Borgin and Burkes">Borgin and Burkes</a> before disappearing. Splitting his own spirit into a total of eight fragments, Tom created an unprecedented seven Horcruxes, with one made later in his life, unintentionally and without his knowledge — <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>. Tom re-emerged several decades later having abandoned his 'Muggle' name and becoming the self-proclaimed Lord Voldemort, an anagram of his birth name. In the <a href="/wiki/First_Wizarding_War" title="First Wizarding War">First</a> and <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second</a> Wizarding Wars, he commanded <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">a veritable army of wizards and Dark creatures</a>; committed countless murders and atrocities; and eventually <a href="/wiki/Fall_of_the_British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="Fall of the British Ministry of Magic">succeeded</a> in taking over the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">British Ministry of Magic</a>. 
</p><p>Voldemort was ripped from his body in <a href="/wiki/1981" title="1981">1981</a> after <a href="/wiki/Attack_at_Godric%27s_Hollow_(1981)" title="Attack at Godric's Hollow (1981)">attempting</a> to kill Harry Potter. Although unable to <a href="/wiki/Death" title="Death">die</a>, he was unable to <a href="/wiki/Return_of_Lord_Voldemort" title="Return of Lord Voldemort">regain a permanent and physical body</a> until <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, thus spending the intervening fourteen years as '<i>a shell, less than the meanest ghost</i>'. He was finally <a href="/wiki/Voldemort%27s_Last_Stand" title="Voldemort's Last Stand">killed</a> by his own backfired <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> after Harry Potter and Albus Dumbledore succeeded in destroying all of his <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>.   
</p><p>Unknown to most, however, Voldemort's legacy and bloodline would live on through his daughter <a href="/wiki/Delphini" title="Delphini">Delphini</a>, whom he conceived with his loyal follower <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>. The conception is thought to have occurred sometime after the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a> in <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a> and before Voldemort's death at Harry's hands in 1998. 
</p><p>Voldemort's broken and mutilated <a href="/wiki/Soul" title="Soul">soul</a> was then trapped in <a href="/wiki/Limbo" title="Limbo">limbo</a> for eternity, unable to move on to the <a href="/wiki/Afterlife" title="Afterlife">afterlife</a> or even return as a <a href="/wiki/Ghost" title="Ghost">disembodied spirit</a>. 
</p>

<dd><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>You mean he is a bully?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Mrs Cole</b>: "<i>I think he must be, but it's very hard to catch him at it. There have been incidents... Nasty things... <a href="/wiki/Billy_Stubbs" title="Billy Stubbs">Billy Stubbs</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Billy_Stubbs%27s_rabbit" title="Billy Stubbs's rabbit">rabbit</a>... well, Tom said he didn't do it and I don't see how he could have done, but even so, it didn't hang itself from the rafters, did it?</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Mrs Cole informing Albus Dumbledore of Tom Riddle's life at Wool's Orphanage<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/Tom_Orphanage.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20081031194143" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom Orphanage" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="166" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Tom Orphanage.JPG" data-image-key="Tom_Orphanage.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/Tom_Orphanage.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081031194143" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/Tom_Orphanage.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20081031194143" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom Orphanage" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/Tom_Orphanage.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081031194143" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="166" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Tom Orphanage.JPG" data-image-key="Tom_Orphanage.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/Tom_Orphanage.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081031194143" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tom_Orphanage.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Tom in his room at <a href="/wiki/Wool%27s_orphanage" class="mw-redirect" title="Wool's orphanage">Wool's orphanage</a>, where he spent the majority of his childhood</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Tom Marvolo Riddle was born on <a href="/wiki/31_December" title="31 December">31 December</a> <a href="/wiki/1926" title="1926">1926</a> at <a href="/wiki/Wool%27s_Orphanage" title="Wool's Orphanage">Wool's Orphanage</a> in <a href="/wiki/London" title="London">London</a>. His mother Merope staggered to the door of the orphanage, gave birth to Tom there, and died shortly after. Riddle grew up in the dingy orphanage, completely unaware of his wizarding heritage. Since the Muggle orphanage staff did not know anything about his mother, they did not know about his magical background. Instead, they believed that Merope was a circus worker, as <a href="/wiki/Cole" title="Cole">Mrs Cole</a> told Dumbledore shortly before his first meeting with Riddle. It is unknown whether or not the staff relayed this to Riddle before his first encounter with Dumbledore.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/48/Young_voldie.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720151022" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Young voldie" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Young voldie.jpg" data-image-key="Young_voldie.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/48/Young_voldie.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720151022" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/48/Young_voldie.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720151022" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Young voldie" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/48/Young_voldie.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720151022" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Young voldie.jpg" data-image-key="Young_voldie.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/48/Young_voldie.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720151022" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Young_voldie.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A young Tom during his time in the orphanage</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure> 
<p>Despite his ignorance of his mother's true background, Riddle did have some grasp on his abilities beyond that of normal magical children of his same age, and an unusually high degree of control over them. He could move objects with his mind and cause them to float wherever he wished, manipulate animals and creatures as he wished, speak Parseltongue, and use his power to inflict harm on other orphans. After getting into a fight with fellow orphan, <a href="/wiki/Billy_Stubbs" title="Billy Stubbs">Billy Stubbs</a>, he used his powers to hang the boy's rabbit from the rafters. On one occasion, he took two other orphans, <a href="/wiki/Dennis_Bishop" title="Dennis Bishop">Dennis Bishop</a> and <a href="/wiki/Amy_Benson" title="Amy Benson">Amy Benson</a>, into a cave, where he performed an act, likely with his powers, so horrifying that the two orphans were traumatised into silence. Afterwards, he may have told them, in some means, not to tell anyone what happened in the cave. Riddle also stole from other orphans and hid their things in his cupboard like trophies.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Discovery_of_being_a_wizard">Discovery of being a wizard</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Did you know, sir? Then...?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>Did I know that I had just met the most dangerous Dark wizard of all-time? No.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— A memory of Dumbledore meeting Tom Riddle for the first time<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/B6C13M1_Tom_Riddle_as_a_child.png/revision/latest?cb=20181021171804" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C13M1 Tom Riddle as a child" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="105" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C13M1 Tom Riddle as a child.png" data-image-key="B6C13M1_Tom_Riddle_as_a_child.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/B6C13M1_Tom_Riddle_as_a_child.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20181021171804" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/B6C13M1_Tom_Riddle_as_a_child.png/revision/latest?cb=20181021171804" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C13M1 Tom Riddle as a child" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/B6C13M1_Tom_Riddle_as_a_child.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20181021171804" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="105" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C13M1 Tom Riddle as a child.png" data-image-key="B6C13M1_Tom_Riddle_as_a_child.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/23/B6C13M1_Tom_Riddle_as_a_child.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20181021171804" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C13M1_Tom_Riddle_as_a_child.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> visiting 11-year-old Tom Riddle at Wool's Orphanage</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Riddle was eleven, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>, who at the time was the <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration_(class)" title="Transfiguration (class)">Transfiguration</a> teacher at Hogwarts, talked to Mrs Cole, who informed him of how unusual the boy was, sharing tales of his extraordinary influence over the other children. When Dumbledore was at last introduced to the boy, Riddle initially believed him to be a doctor or psychiatrist of some sort, coming to take him to an asylum because of what the staff had seen. He was convinced after Dumbledore demonstrated his power by using a <a href="/wiki/Flame-Freezing_Charm" title="Flame-Freezing Charm">Flame-Freezing Charm</a> on Riddle's cupboard and revealed that Hogwarts was a school for people with <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magic</a>, whereupon Riddle realised that was what his abilities were. 
</p><p>Tom also mentioned his proficiency for <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a> in this same meeting, asking if it was a common gift amongst wizards, to which Dumbledore replied, "rare, but not unheard of". Dumbledore also admonished Riddle for stealing from others and made him return the items with his apologies. He also warned Riddle to stop his misbehaviour, as Hogwarts had an honour code whereupon lying, cheating, and stealing were not tolerated.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>At a very early age, it was clear that Riddle displayed a desire to be different and set apart from others (as it was hinted when he mentioned his dislike of his own name, because it was such a common name).<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/60/Young_riddle_orphanage.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161002193849" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Young riddle orphanage" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Young riddle orphanage.gif" data-image-key="Young_riddle_orphanage.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/60/Young_riddle_orphanage.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161002193849" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/60/Young_riddle_orphanage.gif/revision/latest?cb=20161002193849" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Young riddle orphanage" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/60/Young_riddle_orphanage.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161002193849" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Young riddle orphanage.gif" data-image-key="Young_riddle_orphanage.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/60/Young_riddle_orphanage.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161002193849" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Young_riddle_orphanage.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> proving to Riddle that he was a wizard</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Riddle was not surprised upon being informed by Dumbledore that he was a wizard — he was, in fact, eager to believe that he had special gifts that no normal person had. Riddle also showed an eminent fear of death, considering it a human weakness. He claimed that his mother could not have been a witch, because if she was magical, then she would have been able to avoid dying, and thought that his father was a wizard. He asked if his father was an alumnus of Hogwarts, to which Dumbledore said he did not know offhand.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Riddle's abuse of his wizarding powers alarmed Albus. He resolved to keep a close eye on him, something he should have done in any case, seeing as he was '<i>alone and friendless</i>'. Dumbledore also warned Riddle that at Hogwarts he would be introduced to the laws that controlled the usage of magic in the <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizarding world</a>, and that law-breakers were punished with severity not by Hogwarts but the <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>. Riddle's demeanour changed after Dumbledore reprimanded him; he became more guarded and shielded his real reactions to things, adopting a kinder persona. Dumbledore provided Riddle with enough information to find <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">Platform Nine and Three-Quarters</a>. He also provided Riddle with a stipend from school funds so that he could purchase his books and equipment. 
</p><p>Travelling on his own to Diagon Alley, Riddle bought some second-hand robes and spell books for himself, along with his wand, which was thirteen-and-a-half inches, made of yew with a phoenix feather core from <a href="/wiki/Ollivanders" title="Ollivanders">Ollivanders</a>. Little did Riddle know that very wand would, in the future, share the same wand core as <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>. <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Garrick Ollivander</a> later said that the wand was very powerful; Voldemort was very pleased with it until the wand failed him during his confrontation with Harry Potter in the Little Hangleton <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton_graveyard" title="Little Hangleton graveyard">graveyard</a>.
</p>
<h3><span id="Hogwarts_years_.281938.E2.80.931945.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Hogwarts_years_(1938–1945)">Hogwarts years <span class="template-c">(1938–1945)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince"><b>Tom Riddle</b>: "<i>Sir, I wondered what you know about…about Horcruxes?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Horace Slughorn</b>: "<i>Project for Defence Against the Dark Arts, is it?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Tom Riddle</b>: "<i>Not exactly, sir, I came across the term while reading and I didn't fully understand it.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Tom Riddle inquiring about Horcruxes<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half_Blood_Prince" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Riddle was educated at Hogwarts from <a href="/wiki/1938" title="1938">1938</a> to <a href="/wiki/1945" title="1945">1945</a>, and was <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Ceremony" title="Sorting Ceremony">sorted</a> into <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Houses" title="Hogwarts Houses">House</a>, a nod to his ancestor Salazar Slytherin. During summer breaks, he was forced to return to the Muggle orphanage, which he despised and dreaded more than any other place on Earth.<sup id="cite_ref-COS_24-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>24<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/09/Young_Death_Eaters.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720142700" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Young Death Eaters" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Young Death Eaters.jpg" data-image-key="Young_Death_Eaters.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/09/Young_Death_Eaters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720142700" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/09/Young_Death_Eaters.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720142700" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Young Death Eaters" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/09/Young_Death_Eaters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720142700" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Young Death Eaters.jpg" data-image-key="Young_Death_Eaters.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/09/Young_Death_Eaters.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720142700" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Young_Death_Eaters.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club" title="Slug Club">Slug Club</a>, of which Tom was a member of during his education</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Riddle described the way he was seen as '<i>poor, but brilliant, parent-less, but so brave, a school <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefect</a>, a model student</i>'<i>.</i><sup id="cite_ref-COS_24-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>24<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Due to his exceptional acting abilities and handsome looks, he was able to convince virtually all of the Hogwarts staff and instructors that his kinder façade was his true personality. The sole exception to this was Dumbledore, who, though not necessarily suspicious of Riddle, never forgot about his misdeeds at the orphanage, nor his unsettling behaviour during their first meeting. In turn, Riddle realised that he had been careless in showing Dumbledore his true character upon their first meeting, and never attempted to win him over as he had with his other instructors. In time, he came to fear and despise Dumbledore.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20180522233612" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG" data-image-key="Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180522233612" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20180522233612" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180522233612" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG" data-image-key="Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180522233612" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Riddle-Moaning-Myrtle.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Tom Riddle during his time at Hogwarts</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Over time, Riddle gathered to himself a <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_gang" title="Tom Riddle's gang">gang of Slytherin thugs</a>, a motley composition of '<i>the weak seeking protection, the ambitious seeking some shared glory, and the thuggish gravitating toward a leader who could show them more refined forms of cruelty</i>', most of which would become the first <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>. Riddle claimed they were his friends, and made it appear so in public, but in truth, they amounted to little more than servants, and he cared almost nothing for them. He often manipulated them into committing petty crimes and other misdeeds, but none of these incidents were reliably traced back to the group.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Opening_the_Chamber_of_Secrets">Opening the Chamber of Secrets</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Plot_to_open_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Plot to open the Chamber of Secrets">Plot to open the Chamber of Secrets</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>The last time the chamber was opened, a <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Mudblood</a> died.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, regarding the first opening of the Chamber of Secrets<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Tom_in_the_Chamber.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160525185959" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom in the Chamber" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="109" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Tom in the Chamber.jpg" data-image-key="Tom_in_the_Chamber.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Tom_in_the_Chamber.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160525185959" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Tom_in_the_Chamber.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160525185959" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom in the Chamber" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Tom_in_the_Chamber.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160525185959" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="109" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Tom in the Chamber.jpg" data-image-key="Tom_in_the_Chamber.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Tom_in_the_Chamber.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160525185959" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tom_in_the_Chamber.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Tom standing in the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Upon arriving at Hogwarts, Riddle became obsessed with his heritage and began researching it with an insatiable hunger. He focused solely on the identity of his father, still thinking him to be the magical parent, as he had held onto his beliefs that death was a Muggle consequence and a weakness. He searched for his father's name in the school trophy room, in the records of Hogwarts prefects and in records of wizarding history, but found nothing to suggest his father had even attended Hogwarts. He was eventually forced to accept that his father was the Muggle parent, and that his mother was the magical one. It was around this time that Riddle gave himself the alias 'Lord Voldemort', to spare himself of the reminder of his '<i>filthy Muggle father</i>',<sup id="cite_ref-HBP17_25-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP17-25"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>25<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> who he later learned had abandoned his wife after learning she was a witch (although in reality he left her after she stopped controlling him with a love potion).
</p><p>Using his middle name, Marvolo, which was taken from his maternal grandfather, Riddle discovered his mother's heritage and the Gaunts' bloodline connection with Salazar Slytherin. Once Riddle learned of his ancestry, it was not long before he discovered the existence of the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> under Hogwarts, during <a href="/wiki/1942%E2%80%931943_school_year" title="1942–1943 school year">his fifth year</a>, and tamed the <a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">Basilisk</a> which dwelt within. As the Heir of Slytherin through his mother's family, Tom was able to open the Chamber that Slytherin had left behind in order to '<i>purge the school of all those who [were] unworthy to study magic</i>' — in Riddle's and Slytherin's eyes, <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-borns</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-COS_24-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>24<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d7/Tom_Riddle_framing_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180122221747" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom Riddle framing Hagrid" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Tom Riddle framing Hagrid.jpg" data-image-key="Tom_Riddle_framing_Hagrid.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d7/Tom_Riddle_framing_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180122221747" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d7/Tom_Riddle_framing_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180122221747" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom Riddle framing Hagrid" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d7/Tom_Riddle_framing_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180122221747" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Tom Riddle framing Hagrid.jpg" data-image-key="Tom_Riddle_framing_Hagrid.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d7/Tom_Riddle_framing_Hagrid.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180122221747" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tom_Riddle_framing_Hagrid.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A 16-year-old Riddle during the 1943 opening of the Chamber of Secrets threatening <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Around <a href="/wiki/13_June" title="13 June">13 June</a> <a href="/wiki/1943" title="1943">1943</a>, the Basilisk petrified many at Hogwarts, with its final victim being a student named <a href="/wiki/Myrtle_Warren" title="Myrtle Warren">Myrtle Warren</a>, who was killed in the girls' bathroom when she saw the Basilisk's yellow eyes. In light of this incident, the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Board_of_Governors" title="Hogwarts Board of Governors">Hogwarts Board of Governors</a> decided that Hogwarts would be closed. During that year, Riddle made a special request that Headmaster <a href="/wiki/Armando_Dippet" title="Armando Dippet">Armando Dippet</a> would allow him to stay at school over the summer break. However, Dippet informed him of the governors' decision, and refused his request. 
</p><p>Realising that the Chamber would need to be closed and the culprit caught in order to keep the school open (and not have to return permanently to the orphanage), Riddle framed fellow student <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> and his pet <a href="/wiki/Acromantula" title="Acromantula">Acromantula</a>, <a href="/wiki/Aragog" title="Aragog">Aragog</a>. He convinced then-Headmaster Dippet that Aragog was the monster that had terrorised the school. He also noted that Hagrid was keeping a dangerous pet, though this was shallow hypocrisy considering the monster he commanded. Hagrid was expelled, and Riddle received an engraved trophy for <a href="/wiki/Special_Award_for_Services_to_the_School" title="Special Award for Services to the School">Special Services to the School</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-COS_24-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>24<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Dumbledore_watching_Tom_Riddle.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180122221958" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore watching Tom Riddle" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore watching Tom Riddle.jpg" data-image-key="Dumbledore_watching_Tom_Riddle.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Dumbledore_watching_Tom_Riddle.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180122221958" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Dumbledore_watching_Tom_Riddle.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180122221958" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore watching Tom Riddle" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Dumbledore_watching_Tom_Riddle.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180122221958" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore watching Tom Riddle.jpg" data-image-key="Dumbledore_watching_Tom_Riddle.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Dumbledore_watching_Tom_Riddle.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180122221958" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore_watching_Tom_Riddle.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dumbledore '<i>keeping an annoyingly close watch</i>' on Tom</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dumbledore, who did not think that Hagrid was responsible for the killing, managed to arrange for him to be kept on as Hogwarts's groundskeeper. Distrusting Riddle, Dumbledore kept an 'annoyingly close' watch on him after that. Because of this, Riddle realised that he would not be able to risk opening the Chamber while still a student. As such, he would use this murder to eventually preserve a part of his soul within <a href="/wiki/T._M._Riddle%27s_Diary" title="T. M. Riddle's Diary">his own school diary</a>, the very first of his seven <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>, hoping it would one day lead someone to finish Salazar Slytherin's 'noble work'.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Murder_of_the_Riddle_family">Murder of the Riddle family</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Murder_of_the_Riddle_family" title="Murder of the Riddle family">Murder of the Riddle family</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Morfin Gaunt</b>: "<i>I thought you was that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle_Senior" title="Tom Riddle Senior">Muggle</a>, you look mighty like that Muggle.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Riddle</b>: "<i>What Muggle?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Morfin Gaunt</b>: "<i>That Muggle what my sister took a fancy to, that Muggle what lives in the big house over the way, you look right like him. Riddle. But he's older now, in 'e? He's older 'n you, now I think on it... he come back, see.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Riddle confronting his maternal uncle<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/HBP_chapter_17_BW.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190125020314" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HBP chapter 17 BW" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="250" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HBP chapter 17 BW.jpg" data-image-key="HBP_chapter_17_BW.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/HBP_chapter_17_BW.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190125020314" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/HBP_chapter_17_BW.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190125020314" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HBP chapter 17 BW" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/HBP_chapter_17_BW.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190125020314" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="250" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HBP chapter 17 BW.jpg" data-image-key="HBP_chapter_17_BW.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/HBP_chapter_17_BW.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190125020314" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HBP_chapter_17_BW.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Morfin_Gaunt" title="Morfin Gaunt">Morfin Gaunt</a> telling his nephew about the latter's heritage</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Around <a href="/wiki/August" title="August">August</a> <a href="/wiki/1943" title="1943">1943</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-26" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-26"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>26<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Riddle went to Little Hangleton to learn about his mother's family. While at the <a href="/wiki/Gaunt_Shack" title="Gaunt Shack">Gaunt Shack</a>, he met his uncle Morfin Gaunt, with whom he was far from impressed. Morfin mentioned offhandedly at one point during this meeting that he thought that Tom looked '<i>mighty like that Muggle</i>', Merope's husband, Tom Riddle Snr. immediately demanded the identity of the Muggle in question, and Morfin told Riddle the full story of his Muggle father, which infuriated Tom to the point of seeking revenge. Riddle stunned Morfin and took his wand, went over to the <a href="/wiki/Riddle_House" title="Riddle House">Riddle House</a> and, using his uncle's wand, murdered his father, <a href="/wiki/Thomas_Riddle" title="Thomas Riddle">grandfather</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Mary_Riddle" title="Mary Riddle">grandmother</a> with the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a>.
</p><p>Riddle covered up his crimes by altering Morfin's memory, causing him to believe that he was the killer. When the Ministry of Magic investigated the crime, Morfin, who had previously served three years in <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a> for using magic in front of, and against, Muggles, freely admitted to the deed and was sentenced to life imprisonment in Azkaban. Tom took the <a href="/wiki/Marvolo_Gaunt%27s_Ring" title="Marvolo Gaunt's Ring">Gaunt family's signet ring</a> from Morfin and later on would preserve another part of his soul within it to make his second Horcrux, wearing it like a trophy at Hogwarts.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Learning_about_Horcruxes">Learning about Horcruxes</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Riddle</b>: "<i>How do you split your soul?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Horace Slughorn</b>: "<i>Well, you must understand that the soul is supposed to remain intact and whole. Splitting it is an act of violation, it is against nature.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Riddle</b>: "<i>But how do you do it?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Horace Slughorn</b>: "<i>By an act of evil — the supreme act of evil. By commiting murder. Killing rips the soul apart. The wizard intent upon creating a Horcrux would use the damage to his advantage: He would encase the torn portion —</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Horace Slughorn and Tom Riddle discussing how Horcruxes were made<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2e/Slughorn_and_Riddle.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20180720151739" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Slughorn and Riddle" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Slughorn and Riddle.jpeg" data-image-key="Slughorn_and_Riddle.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2e/Slughorn_and_Riddle.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720151739" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2e/Slughorn_and_Riddle.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20180720151739" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Slughorn and Riddle" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2e/Slughorn_and_Riddle.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720151739" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Slughorn and Riddle.jpeg" data-image-key="Slughorn_and_Riddle.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2e/Slughorn_and_Riddle.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720151739" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Slughorn_and_Riddle.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Young Riddle asking <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Professor Slughorn</a> about <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In the <a href="/wiki/1943%E2%80%931944_school_year" title="1943–1944 school year">1943–1944 school year</a>, during his sixth year, Riddle questioned <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Professor Slughorn</a>, who was taken in by Riddle's charisma and talent, about the possibility of creating more than one Horcrux, an event Slughorn felt deeply ashamed of in his later years. In his mid-teen years, Riddle already sought to make himself <a href="/wiki/Immortality" title="Immortality">immortal</a>; being unable to find any recorded information on creating multiple Horcruxes. He wanted to split his soul into seven, as this is the most powerful magical number, and asked the experienced and knowledgeable Slughorn for an opinion before attempting this unknown feat. Slughorn answered all of Riddle's questions thinking it was merely academic curiosity but was deeply horrified at the thought of creating multiple Horcruxes.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/First_time.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090531143922" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="First time" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="First time.jpg" data-image-key="First_time.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/First_time.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20090531143922" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/First_time.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090531143922" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="First time" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/First_time.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20090531143922" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="First time.jpg" data-image-key="First_time.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/First_time.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20090531143922" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:First_time.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Riddle <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">splitting his soul</a> for the first time</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Riddle succeeded in doing so at some point during this year, creating his first Horcrux in the form of the aforementioned diary and his second in the form of the inherited ring. During Riddle's seventh year at Hogwarts, he was made <a href="/wiki/Head_Boy_or_Girl" title="Head Boy or Girl">Head Boy</a>, earned outstanding marks in every examination he took, and received a <a href="/wiki/Medal_for_Magical_Merit" title="Medal for Magical Merit">Medal for Magical Merit</a>. Riddle was regarded as one of the most brilliant students ever to attend Hogwarts, a fact admitted by Dumbledore himself.
</p>
<div style="clear:left; margin:0; padding:0;"></div>
<h3><span id="After_Hogwarts_.281945.E2.80.931949.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="After_Hogwarts_(1945–1949)">After Hogwarts <span class="template-c">(1945–1949)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>Rumours of your doings have reached your old school, Tom. I should be sorry to believe half of them.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Riddle</b>: "<i>Greatness inspires envy, envy engenders spite, spite spawns lies. You must know this, Dumbledore.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— A business intercourse between a headmaster and his old student<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><p>
After graduating, Riddle immediately approached Dippet and asked him for a chance to teach <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>, and to remain at Hogwarts, for reasons that he did not confide with the then-headmaster — Hogwarts being his true home at heart, using the influential position as a teacher to recruit students into his future army, and to continue learning the castle's magical secrets. Dippet refused this offer, deeming the boy too young, but invited Riddle to reapply in a few years, if he was still interested in the post, something that Dumbledore heavily advised against.</p><figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7d/B2C4M2_Borgin_and_Burkes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20241130194444" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B2C4M2 Borgin and Burkes" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C4M2
