</p>
<h3><span id="The_rise_of_the_Dark_Lord_.281950.E2.80.931970.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="The_rise_of_the_Dark_Lord_(1950–1970)">The rise of the Dark Lord <span class="template-c">(1950–1970)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Murdering_Hepzibah_Smith">Murdering Hepzibah Smith</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>But before they were sure beyond doubt that the cup and the locket were both gone, the assistant who had worked at <a href="/wiki/Borgin_and_Burkes" title="Borgin and Burkes">Borgin and Burkes</a>, the young man who had visited Hepzibah so regularly and charmed her so well, had resigned his post and vanished. His superiors had no idea where he had gone; they were as surprised as anyone at his disappearance. And that was the last that was seen or heard of Tom Riddle for a very long time. </i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Tom disappearing after murdering Hepzibah Smith<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a9/B6C20M1_cropped_Riddle_and_Hepzibah.png/revision/latest?cb=20141222162612" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C20M1 cropped Riddle and Hepzibah" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="161" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C20M1 cropped Riddle and Hepzibah.png" data-image-key="B6C20M1_cropped_Riddle_and_Hepzibah.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a9/B6C20M1_cropped_Riddle_and_Hepzibah.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141222162612" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a9/B6C20M1_cropped_Riddle_and_Hepzibah.png/revision/latest?cb=20141222162612" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C20M1 cropped Riddle and Hepzibah" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a9/B6C20M1_cropped_Riddle_and_Hepzibah.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141222162612" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="161" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C20M1 cropped Riddle and Hepzibah.png" data-image-key="B6C20M1_cropped_Riddle_and_Hepzibah.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a9/B6C20M1_cropped_Riddle_and_Hepzibah.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141222162612" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C20M1_cropped_Riddle_and_Hepzibah.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Hepzibah_Smith" title="Hepzibah Smith">Hepzibah Smith</a> showing Riddle Slytherin's Locket</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>While working at Borgin and Burkes, Riddle befriended <a href="/wiki/Hepzibah_Smith" title="Hepzibah Smith">Hepzibah Smith</a>, a wealthy and elderly descendant of <a href="/wiki/Helga_Hufflepuff" title="Helga Hufflepuff">Helga Hufflepuff</a>. Between <a href="/wiki/1955" title="1955">1955</a> and <a href="/wiki/1960" title="1960">1960</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-28" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-28"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>28<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hepzibah showed Riddle her two most valuable treasures: <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin's Locket">his ancestor's locket</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff's Cup">her ancestor's cup</a>. Tom's eyes flashed red with cupidity upon seeing these objects, seeing the locket to be rightfully his as Slytherin's heir and the cup as a reminder of Hogwarts, as well as a priceless artefact. 
</p><p>Riddle murdered Hepzibah, by using a '<a href="/wiki/Little-known_poison" title="Little-known poison">little known poison</a>', to steal these coveted objects and vanished without a trace. He again covered his tracks well by implanting another false memory into an innocent bystander — <a href="/wiki/Hokey" title="Hokey">Hokey</a>, Hepzibah's <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a>. Hokey admitted to accidentally putting <a href="/wiki/Poison" title="Poison">poison</a> into Hepzibah's cocoa, which was believed, as Hokey was elderly herself and thus believed to be senile. Meanwhile, Riddle immediately resigned his post at Borgin and Burkes and fled with the cup and locket, subsequently turning them into two more Horcruxes using the murders of Hepzibah and an unidentified <a href="/wiki/Muggle_tramp_killed_by_Tom_Riddle" title="Muggle tramp killed by Tom Riddle">Muggle tramp</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span id="Lord_Voldemort.27s_request"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Lord_Voldemort's_request">Lord Voldemort's request</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>I have experimented; I have pushed the boundaries of magic further, perhaps, than they have ever been pushed —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Tom regarding the magical experimentation he did while abroad<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Riddle disappeared for ten long years. He slipped deeper into the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">Dark Arts</a>, travelled extensively, consorted with disreputable people, began to become distorted in appearance and lose his handsomeness due to splitting his soul so many times, and began to use the alias 'Lord Voldemort' openly. Dumbledore would go so far as to speculate that Riddle's increasingly twisted visage was also attributed to other forms of Dark Arts he delved into as much as Horcruxes throughout those years, partaking in dangerous magical transformations in the process.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP20_4-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP20-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-COS18_29-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS18-29"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>29<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> He also severed contact with Slughorn, who became upset by Riddle not taking up the Potions Master's employment offers.
</p><p>Ten years after Hepzibah Smith's murder, Riddle appealed once more to the Headmaster of Hogwarts, now Albus Dumbledore, for the position of Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts. After a short, superficially amiable chat, Dumbledore directly confronted Riddle regarding why he had requested the position, as he knew full well that Riddle had no desire whatsoever to teach. Riddle, unable to make an open request of Dumbledore due to the malicious nature of his true intentions, simply left after a final, gentle rebuke from his former teacher. From that day on, Hogwarts was never able to keep a Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher for more than a year, which was attributed by Dumbledore to a <a href="/wiki/Jinx_on_the_post_of_Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts_teacher" title="Jinx on the post of Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher">curse</a> by Riddle. The visit to Hogwarts was not fruitless, however, for Riddle used the opportunity to hide the diadem in the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a>, where he believed it would never be found.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> The jinx he placed on the post of Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher would prevent the school from being able to teach its students such subject at its fullest — a precaution to mitigate chances of facing more future enemies who excel in Defence Against Dark Arts through enrolling there.
</p><p>Voldemort, as Riddle was now exclusively called, spent the next few years before the <a href="/wiki/First_Wizarding_War" title="First Wizarding War">First Wizarding War</a> gathering followers in witches and wizards who collectively called themselves Death Eaters.<sup id="cite_ref-30" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-30"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>30<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Some were supportive of his cause to dominate Muggles and Muggle-borns; while others were greedy for domination, wealth and fame; and yet others joined the Dark Lord out of fear. Voldemort considered them more like servants than friends or family. According to <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, Voldemort also used tricks, jinxes, and blackmail to get people to willingly join him. 
</p><p>At some point around this time, Voldemort greatly enhanced his skills in <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">Legilimency</a>, to the point that Snape claimed he was the most accomplished Legilimens the world had ever seen. Voldemort could read, control, and unhinge the minds of others, and could almost always tell when he was being lied to. According to <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>, Voldemort often enjoyed invading the minds of others, creating visions designed to torture them into madness. Only after extracting the last exquisite ounce of agony, only when he had them literally begging for death, would he finally kill them.
</p>
<h3><span id="First_Wizarding_War_.281970.E2.80.931981.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="First_Wizarding_War_(1970–1981)">First Wizarding War <span class="template-c">(1970–1981)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>He was takin' over. 'Course, some stood up to him — an' he killed 'em.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort's actions during the First Wizarding War<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170508224423" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter1-voldemort" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170508224423" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170508224423" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter1-voldemort" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170508224423" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170508224423" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter1-voldemort.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort wearing a hooded cloak during the First War, as a possible means to invoke fear</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In 1970, Voldemort started the First Wizarding War by taking advantage of one of the wizarding world's greatest weaknesses: the beings and creatures that they had outcast. The Dark Lord recruited the <a href="/wiki/Giant" title="Giant">giants</a>, who had long ago been driven by <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizardkind</a> into the mountains, and <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolves</a>, who were persecuted by most witches and wizards. Many feared that the <a href="/wiki/Goblin" title="Goblin">goblins</a> would also join him, as they were restricted from wand use, but it never happened. In fact, Voldemort murdered a family of goblins near Nottingham at some point during the war, for an unknown reason (possibly anger at the neutrality of the goblins, or no reason at all). Voldemort's army caused widespread destruction and mayhem during the war.
</p><p><a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Senior" title="Bartemius Crouch Senior">Bartemius Crouch Snr</a>, who was the head of the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement" title="Department of Magical Law Enforcement">Department of Magical Law Enforcement</a> at the time and was known for his fanatical hatred of the Dark Arts, issued an edict that gave <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Aurors</a> authorisation to use Unforgivable Curses on Death Eaters without warning, and suspects were sometimes handed over to the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> without a <a href="/wiki/Wizengamot" title="Wizengamot">Wizengamot</a> trial. Many innocent people were locked away. Due to the atrocities committed by the Death Eaters and Voldemort, and his terrifying persona, people were even afraid to speak his name, and he was referred to as <i>'You-Know-Who'</i> or <i>'He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named'.</i>
</p><p>Under the staunch protection of Dumbledore, the only person who Voldemort truly feared, Hogwarts remained a safe place of learning throughout the entire war. The <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> was created by Dumbledore at this time to fight against Voldemort. The war itself lasted for eleven long years, during which the Dark Lord and his followers were responsible for the mass execution of several prominent wizarding families that had exhibited loyalty to the anti-Death Eater movement, including the <a href="/wiki/Bones_family" title="Bones family">Boneses</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Prewett_family" title="Prewett family">Prewetts</a> and the <a href="/wiki/McKinnon_family" title="McKinnon family">McKinnons</a>. Voldemort, who rarely dared to fight those that he did not consider equal to him in terms of skill, was also responsible for murdering <a href="/wiki/Dorcas_Meadowes" title="Dorcas Meadowes">Dorcas Meadowes</a>, a member of the Order of the Phoenix that he killed personally.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Visiting_the_Lee_family">Visiting the Lee family</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>Eventually, Lord Voldemort visited the home of the <a href="/wiki/Barnaby_Lee%27s_father" title="Barnaby Lee's father">father</a> of <a href="/wiki/Barnaby_Lee" title="Barnaby Lee">Barnaby Lee</a>. Mr Lee told his son he was capable of anything if he could become as strong as the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Lord" title="Dark Lord">Dark Lord</a>, showing faith in his master. He later drowned Barnaby's pet <a href="/wiki/Barnaby_Lee%27s_father%27s_Kneazle" title="Barnaby Lee's father's Kneazle">Kneazle</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HM_32-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HM-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span id="Testing_his_Horcrux.27s_defences"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Testing_his_Horcrux's_defences">Testing his Horcrux's defences</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>To the Dark Lord - I know I will be dead long before you read this, but I want you to know it was I who discovered your secret, I have stolen the real <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a> and intend to destroy it as soon as I can, I can face death in the hope, that when you meet your match, you will be mortal once again. -R.A.B.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Regulus Black's letter to Voldemort before his untimely death<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Harry-potter1-voldemort_cottage.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170730194346" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter1-voldemort cottage" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-voldemort cottage.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-voldemort_cottage.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Harry-potter1-voldemort_cottage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170730194346" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Harry-potter1-voldemort_cottage.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170730194346" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter1-voldemort cottage" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Harry-potter1-voldemort_cottage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170730194346" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter1-voldemort cottage.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter1-voldemort_cottage.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0f/Harry-potter1-voldemort_cottage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170730194346" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter1-voldemort_cottage.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Lord Voldemort preparing to murder wizards and witches who opposed him</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In <a href="/wiki/1979" title="1979">1979</a>, Voldemort decided to test the defences around his Horcruxes. He placed Slytherin's locket in the crystal cave, and asked <a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">Regulus Black</a>, a loyal 18-year-old Death Eater to lend him his house-elf, <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a>. Voldemort took the elf with him to the cave, forced him to drink the <a href="/wiki/Emerald_Potion" title="Emerald Potion">Emerald Potion</a>, and left him to die on the Crystal Cave Island. Kreacher was able to escape using house-elf magic, and told Regulus of what had happened. Over the years, Voldemort created an army of Inferi from the people he had killed to further strengthen his defences. Upon hearing Kreacher's story, Regulus, who had already been somewhat uncomfortable with the reality of being a Death Eater, decided to defect. 
</p><p>From clues left behind by Voldemort, he deduced that his master had created a Horcrux in order to become immortal. He took a duplicate locket and placed a note inside for Voldemort to find, then ordered Kreacher to take him to where the real locket was hidden. Kreacher guided Regulus past the cave's defences. At the island, with the basin of potion containing the locket, Regulus ordered Kreacher to take it once the potion was gone and replace it with the fake one, then escape without him and find a way to destroy the Horcrux. Regulus drank the potion himself, and when he tried to get water from the lake to quench his thirst, he was dragged to his death by the <a href="/wiki/Inferius" title="Inferius">Inferi</a>. Kreacher obeyed his master's orders and switched the lockets before escaping. However, despite his best efforts, he was unable to destroy the Horcrux.
</p><p>During this time, Voldemort gave his old diary to <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a>, one of his most loyal Death Eaters, and ordered him to hide it. Malfoy kept it safe in <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">his manor</a>, but the Dark Lord never told him that the diary contained a fragment of his soul. Voldemort informed him only that the diary was cleverly charmed and smuggling it into Hogwarts will cause the reopening of the legendary Chamber of Secrets and send the Basilisk living inside the chamber to finish Slytherin's idea of cleaning the school of all Muggle-borns, thus proving that Voldemort was Slytherin's true heir.
</p><p>Voldemort also left the Hufflepuff's cup in the care of <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>, another one of his loyal Death Eaters. Much like her brother-in-law Lucius, Bellatrix was ordered to hide it, so she stored it in <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">her family vault</a> at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts Wizarding Bank</a>, which was considered impossible to plunder. She treated the object with extreme priority, although Voldemort had not informed her that the cup was a Horcrux. The cup was protected by the bank's extensive security measures, but Lestrange casted some protective curses on it, like a spell which would cause any object to multiply exponentially if touched by anyone other than the vault's owners or to cause the object itself to glow hot as fire and burn the flesh of anyone trying to remove it without authorisation.
</p><p>Probably during this time, he returned Gaunt's ring to the Gaunt shack. He placed the ring inside a golden box and hid it beneath the shack's rotting floorboard, setting up many protective enchantments to deter outsiders from entering the shack and finding the ring. He also placed a powerful curse on the ring as well, one that would quickly lead to the death of the ring's wearer if not stemmed.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="The_prophecy">The prophecy</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>The one with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord approaches... Born to those who have thrice defied him, born as the seventh month dies... And the Dark Lord will mark him as equal, but he will have power the Dark Lord knows not... And either must die at the hand of the other for neither can live while the other survives... The one with the power to vanquish the Dark Lord will be born as the seventh month dies...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_prophecy_(1980)" title="Sybill Trelawney's prophecy (1980)">Sybill Trelawney's first prophecy</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Trelawney_first_prophecy.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160731031735" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Trelawney first prophecy" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="122" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Trelawney first prophecy.jpg" data-image-key="Trelawney_first_prophecy.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Trelawney_first_prophecy.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160731031735" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Trelawney_first_prophecy.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160731031735" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Trelawney first prophecy" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Trelawney_first_prophecy.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160731031735" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="122" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Trelawney first prophecy.jpg" data-image-key="Trelawney_first_prophecy.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a6/Trelawney_first_prophecy.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160731031735" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Trelawney_first_prophecy.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Trelawney's first prophecy regarding Harry Potter and Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ten years into the war, when Voldemort was at the height of his dominion, a prophecy was given by <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney" title="Sybill Trelawney">Sybill Trelawney</a> to Albus Dumbledore which predicted the fall of the Dark Lord. This prophecy was given in the <a href="/wiki/Hog%27s_Head_Inn" title="Hog's Head Inn">Hog's Head Inn</a> during an interview for the position of Professor of <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> This prophecy was overheard by Death Eater and informant <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> According to Dumbledore, Snape only heard half of the prophecy and was then thrown out by the barman, <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a>, Albus's brother. He relayed to Voldemort what he had heard, not realising that he had missed an important part of the message.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Trelawney's description of the night's events was a bit different however, as she stated that after feeling 'ill', Aberforth burst into the room with Snape in tow, whom he had caught eavesdropping at the door. This is in contrast with Dumbledore's description of events. However, this may be due to the fact that Dumbledore had wished to conceal the identity of the spy from Harry and told him a simplified version of the events. In any case, Voldemort received only the first part of the prophecy. Feeling threatened, he sprang into action to prevent the fulfilment of the prophecy.
</p><p>There were, at the time, two babies to whom the prophecy could have referred — <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>, the half-blood son of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(I)" title="James Potter (I)">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter_(I)" title="Lily Potter (I)">Lily Potter</a>; and <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>, the pure-blood son of <a href="/wiki/Frank_Longbottom" title="Frank Longbottom">Frank</a> and <a href="/wiki/Alice_Longbottom" title="Alice Longbottom">Alice Longbottom</a>. Both families had sought to thwart Voldemort three times, and both families were members of the Order of the Phoenix. Both children in question were born at the end of July. Voldemort chose to target Harry instead of Neville; Dumbledore suspected that this was because Harry shared a similar family heritage with Voldemort, both of them being half-bloods.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

On 31 October 1981, he told Voldemort of their location. The Dark Lord travelled to <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric's Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>, and with the Potters' <a href="/wiki/Fidelius_Charm" title="Fidelius Charm">Fidelius Charm</a> broken, he simply walked into <a href="/wiki/Potter_cottage" title="Potter cottage">their home</a>. Once inside, he proceeded to murder James and Lily, who did not have their wands. However, when he used the Killing Curse on Harry, it rebounded and seemingly obliterated his body. This happened because Lily lovingly sacrificed her life to protect her son, creating <a href="/wiki/Sacrificial_protection" title="Sacrificial protection">a powerful defence of ancient magic</a> around Harry which protected him for many years.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_11-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> After eleven years of domination and warfare, Voldemort was defeated for the first time.
</p><figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180606142545" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Voldemort 1981" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Voldemort 1981.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180606142545" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180606142545" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Voldemort 1981" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180606142545" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Voldemort 1981.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b7/Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180606142545" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Voldemort_1981.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Infant Harry Potter facing death for the first time</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>It was at this point that Voldemort's next Horcrux was unknowingly created. Years of experimentation, murder, and deliberately ripping his soul apart into so many Horcruxes had rendered the remainder of his soul so unstable that, when his body was destroyed, a small shard of his soul broke apart from the rest and latched onto the only other living being in what remained of the room: Harry Potter himself. The soul shard latched onto Harry's own soul, granting him some of the Dark Lord's own powers and providing him with a latent connection to Voldemort's own mind. Ironically, Harry became the Dark Lord's sixth Horcrux, the desired number Voldemort wanted in order to split his soul into seven pieces. Whatever remained of Voldemort's mangled soul swiftly escaped from the ruins of the house that same night.
</p>
<h3><span id="Missing_years_.281981.E2.80.931994.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Missing_years_(1981–1994)">Missing years <span class="template-c">(1981–1994)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>I was ripped from my body, less than spirit, less than the meanest ghost, but still, I was alive.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Lord Voldemort regarding his fall from power<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest?cb=20190313000102" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C30M1 Wizengamot trial Pensieve memory" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C30M1 Wizengamot trial Pensieve memory.png" data-image-key="B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000102" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest?cb=20190313000102" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C30M1 Wizengamot trial Pensieve memory" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000102" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C30M1 Wizengamot trial Pensieve memory.png" data-image-key="B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ae/B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000102" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C30M1_Wizengamot_trial_Pensieve_memory.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Death Eaters' trial</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After Voldemort's first fall from domination, the Death Eaters dispersed and attempted to return to normal life, believing him to be dead. Many claimed they had been under the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a>, while others stayed true to their master and continued his work, most notably the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_family" title="Lestrange family">Lestrange family</a>, who were eventually taken into custody, convicted at trial, and imprisoned in Azkaban. Most of them. however, ultimately managed to remain free and to reintegrate into society.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Voldemort_Spirit.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20180811003923" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort Spirit" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="251" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort Spirit.JPG" data-image-key="Voldemort_Spirit.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Voldemort_Spirit.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180811003923" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Voldemort_Spirit.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20180811003923" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort Spirit" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Voldemort_Spirit.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180811003923" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="251" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort Spirit.JPG" data-image-key="Voldemort_Spirit.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Voldemort_Spirit.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180811003923" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_Spirit.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort's disembodied soul</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Voldemort lost his physical form and magical powers, but he remained alive in ghostly form. The Horcruxes he had created kept his spirit bound to the physical world. He retreated to the forests of Albania, where he had previously found his fifth Horcrux, and waited for his faithful Death Eaters to find him, but many of them now believed him dead, and those still faithful to him were either dead or in Azkaban. His one remaining power was possession. 
</p><p>He gained physical form by inhabiting animals, mainly snakes, though he disliked doing so because the bodies of such animals were ill-equipped to perform magic, and because his possession significantly reduced their lifespans; none of his hosts survived for too long and he would return to his spirit form. Additionally, any help that he could have potentially rendered himself required the use of a wand, and animals, obviously, could not be used for this purpose. Voldemort did not dare enter the communities to possess humans, as he knew that Aurors were still abroad, looking for any signs of him.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_11-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

<p>In <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>, Voldemort formed a plan to regain his physical body. Hogwarts Professor <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirinus Quirrell</a> had made a voyage to Albania, where his foolish and gullible mind was vulnerable to Voldemort. He latched onto Quirrell's body and came back to England with him.
</p><p>Somehow, Voldemort learned of the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher's Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a>, and how it could restore him to his physical form. He ordered Quirrell to steal the stone from <a href="/wiki/Vault_713" title="Vault 713">Vault 713</a> in <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts Wizarding Bank</a> so he could make the <a href="/wiki/Elixir_of_Life" title="Elixir of Life">Elixir of Life</a>. Voldemort discovered that the Stone had been removed earlier the same day, and through Quirrell's connections at Hogwarts, learned it was hidden at the school.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_11-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>The same year that Voldemort set to the task of stealing the Stone, <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> began his first year at Hogwarts. There were many barriers protecting the Stone. <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>, who had switched sides near the end of the war and become a professor of <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a>, was suspicious of Quirrell and hounded him relentlessly. On 31 October, Quirrell released a <a href="/wiki/Troll" title="Troll">troll</a> in the Hogwarts dungeons as a distraction and sneaked to the Third Floor Corridor, where the Stone was being hidden. Snape followed him and blocked him off, but he had been bitten on the leg by the three-headed dog <a href="/wiki/Fluffy" title="Fluffy">Fluffy</a> in the process.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_11-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Voldemort was not to be stopped.
</p>

<p>Later in the year, during a <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_vs_Slytherin_Quidditch_match_(1991)" title="Gryffindor vs Slytherin Quidditch match (1991)">Quidditch match between Gryffindor and Slytherin</a>, Voldemort ordered Quirrell to kill Harry Potter. Quirrell jinxed <a href="/wiki/Nimbus_2000" title="Nimbus 2000">Harry's broomstick</a> to throw him off, but Snape tried to save Harry with a counter-curse. <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>, observing the crowd through binoculars to figure out who was jinxing the broom, saw Snape discreetly uttering the counter-curse incantation but mistakenly assumed he was performing the actual curse. Running to Snape's stand and setting fire to his robes to distract him and make him stop, she accidentally knocked Quirrell over. This meant that Quirrell broke the necessary eye contact for performing his spell correctly.
</p>

<dd>— Voldemort feasting on Unicorn blood<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>

Voldemort ordered Quirrell to prey on <a href="/wiki/Unicorn" title="Unicorn">unicorns</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a> and drink <a href="/wiki/Unicorn_blood" title="Unicorn blood">their blood</a> so he could gain strength from the unicorn's healing abilities and keep Quirrell alive. Quirrell met Harry, <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Fang" title="Fang">Fang</a> there, and was about to attack Harry until the centaur <a href="/wiki/Firenze" title="Firenze">Firenze</a> rescued him. About a week before Harry's exams, Harry overheard a conversation between Voldemort and Quirrell, in which the Dark Lord ordered the Defence teacher to try to get the stone again. Potter mistook the conversation for an argument between Snape and Quirrell, because after the match with Hufflepuff he saw the Potions Master trying to intimidate Quirrell. </p><figure class="thumb Under the influence of a fair amount of mead, Hagrid divulged to Quirrell that playing music for Fluffy would put him to sleep.
</p><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Second_encounter_with_Harry_Potter">Second encounter with Harry Potter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/4_June" title="4 June">4 June</a> <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a>, Voldemort ordered Quirrell to send a fake letter to Albus Dumbledore, asking him to go to the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic_headquarters" title="British Ministry of Magic headquarters">Ministry of Magic</a>. Voldemort moved forward with his goal, moving through the security barriers to the <a href="/wiki/Mirror_of_Erised" title="Mirror of Erised">Mirror of Erised</a>. Quirrell saw himself presenting the stone to his master but could not figure out how to get it.
</p>

<p>It was only when Harry arrived, thinking he was protecting the Stone from Snape, that Voldemort saw a way he could get it. Dumbledore would later say, <i>'Only those who wanted to find the stone, but not use it, could get it from the mirror.'</i> Voldemort figured this out, and Quirrell attacked Harry. When he touched Harry, however, his hands blistered and burned. Harry then placed his hands on Quirrell's face, severely injuring him. However, before Quirrell could harm Harry, Dumbledore appeared, and Voldemort's soul fled, killing Quirrell in the process. Voldemort returned to the Albanian forest, weaker than ever. He had to wait yet again for someone to help him.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Reopening_the_Chamber_of_Secrets">Reopening the Chamber of Secrets</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>Well, how is it that </i>you<i> — a skinny boy with no extraordinary magical talent — managed to defeat the greatest wizard of all time? How did </i>you<i> escape with nothing but a scar, while Lord Voldemort's powers were destroyed?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>Why do you care how I escaped? Voldemort was after your time....</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>Voldemort is my past, present, and future, Harry Potter....</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Voldemort revealing his true identity to Harry Potter<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151211144355" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="119" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151211144355" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151211144355" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151211144355" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="119" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151211144355" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-movie-screencaps.com-12239.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Diary Riddle showing Harry Potter one of his memories</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Voldemort was still hiding in Albania, after his unsuccessful attempt to steal the Philosopher's Stone, Lucius Malfoy was still in possession of his diary. In the summer of 1992, <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a> began conducting raids on several wizarding households to seize Dark or illegally enchanted objects under his recently proposed Muggle Protection Act. Before Malfoy Manor could be raided, Lucius sold several of his more incriminating possessions at Borgin and Burkes and set in motion the old task that Voldemort assigned him which involved reopening the Chamber of Secrets. At <a href="/wiki/Flourish_and_Blotts" title="Flourish and Blotts">Flourish and Blotts</a>, Malfoy planted the diary on 11-year-old <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, who brought it to Hogwarts. By doing this, he hoped to kill two birds with one stone: he would rid himself of any connections to the Dark Arts and discredit Arthur Weasley.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Ginevra_Weasley_Writing_on_the_Wall.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140407011351" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ginevra Weasley Writing on the Wall" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ginevra Weasley Writing on the Wall.gif" data-image-key="Ginevra_Weasley_Writing_on_the_Wall.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Ginevra_Weasley_Writing_on_the_Wall.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140407011351" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Ginevra_Weasley_Writing_on_the_Wall.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140407011351" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ginevra Weasley Writing on the Wall" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Ginevra_Weasley_Writing_on_the_Wall.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140407011351" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ginevra Weasley Writing on the Wall.gif" data-image-key="Ginevra_Weasley_Writing_on_the_Wall.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Ginevra_Weasley_Writing_on_the_Wall.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140407011351" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ginevra_Weasley_Writing_on_the_Wall.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The diary possessing Ginny and causing her to write messages on the wall</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ginny began writing in it and discovered that 16-year-old Tom Riddle was responding. She found comfort in the diary, confiding it with her worries, unaware she was being manipulated. Riddle would always have sympathy. The diary slowly drained the life and energy from Ginny, transferring it to itself. Under the diary's control, Ginny reopened the Chamber of Secrets and released the Basilisk, which <a href="/wiki/Petrification" title="Petrification">petrified</a> several students. While possessed, she also killed Hagrid's roosters and wrote threatening messages on the school corridors in rooster blood. Knowing that the diary was doing something to her, Ginny became upset and confused and tried to flush it down the toilet in Moaning Myrtle's bathroom. Harry and Ginny's brother <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> accidentally stumbled upon it, and Harry began communicating with the diary.<sup id="cite_ref-COS_24-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>24<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

<p>When Ginny saw that Harry had the diary, she stole it back, for she did not want Harry to discover all the things she had written in the diary, especially her feelings for him, and what she had done while under its influence. When this piece of Voldemort's soul was ready to take his physical form from Ginny's life, the diary lured her into the Chamber while ignoring her pleas and cries for mercy. Harry found Ginny in time and destroyed the Basilisk with <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a>. <a href="/wiki/Fawkes" title="Fawkes">Fawkes</a> also arrived, summoned by Harry's profound devotion and loyalty to Dumbledore.
</p><p>This encounter and Horcrux are what revealed Voldemort's past as 'Tom Marvolo Riddle' to Harry. At first, Harry thought he was an ally and asked him to help. Then, when revealing his true identity to Harry, Riddle implied that he wanted to kill Harry in revenge for destroying him over even continuing Salazar Slytherin's wish of purging the school of Muggle-borns. Instinctively, Harry used the Basilisk's fang to stab the diary, thinking it would destroy its dark power.<sup id="cite_ref-COS_24-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>24<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Not only was the diary destroyed, but Harry also unknowingly destroyed one of Voldemort's Horcruxes.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 
</p>

<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Gathering_the_old_comrades">Gathering the old comrades</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<p>In the summer of 1994, when Voldemort had all but given up hope of obtaining any help from his former servants, Peter Pettigrew, also known as 'Wormtail', who had faked his own death years earlier and hid from authorities in his <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagus</a> form of a rat, travelled to Albania. Tired of travelling and hungry, Wormtail decided to eat something in an inn near the forest in which Voldemort was hiding. He was found there by <a href="/wiki/Bertha_Jorkins" title="Bertha Jorkins">Bertha Jorkins</a>, a <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> worker who was on holiday in Albania. Although she recognised Peter, Pettigrew lured her into Voldemort's forest hideout and overpowered her before handing her over to the Dark Lord. Upon torturing her, Voldemort was surprised to find that someone had put a powerful <a href="/wiki/Memory_Charm" title="Memory Charm">Memory Charm</a> on her. 
</p><p>After breaking the charm, Voldemort learned from her that the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a> would be held at Hogwarts this year and that <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a>, an ex-Auror, will teach Defence Against the Dark Arts. She also revealed to him that <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Junior" title="Bartemius Crouch Junior">Bartemius Crouch Jnr</a>, one of his loyal Death Eaters, who had been imprisoned in Azkaban after his fall and was thought to be dead, was alive. <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Senior" title="Bartemius Crouch Senior">Bartemius Crouch Snr</a> was concealing his son at his home after helping him escape prison. 
</p><p>Jorkins had stumbled upon Crouch Jnr at his house, and Crouch Snr placed a Memory Charm on her so that she would not report it.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Unable to possess her body and mind, which were damaged by the spells he cast, Voldemort murdered her. Knowing also that Wormtail had been deemed dead by the wizarding community, and would have attracted too much attention, Voldemort did not possess his body either. Together, they built a rudimentary body that Voldemort used for travel and performing magic. While in this form, Voldemort was forced to drink a <a href="/wiki/Rudimentary_body_potion" title="Rudimentary body potion">Rudimentary body potion</a> made from <a href="/wiki/Unicorn_blood" title="Unicorn blood">unicorn blood</a> and <a href="/wiki/Nagini%27s_venom" title="Nagini's venom">venom</a> from <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Snake" title="Snake">snake</a> he befriended, to sustain his life. At some point after Jorkins's murder, he turned Nagini into his last Horcrux, believing his soul to be in seven pieces.
</p><p>Knowing that Dumbledore was sure to have seen to it that the Philosopher's Stone was destroyed, Voldemort knew that he would be unable to use the Elixir of Life to create a new body for himself.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF33_8-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF33-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Voldemort decided to attempt an old piece of ritualistic Dark Magic to create a potion that would restore him to a body. He made plans to travel to England in order to obtain two of the three key ingredients: a bone from his father and the blood of his most hated enemy, Harry Potter. The third ingredient, the flesh of a servant willingly given, he would obtain from Wormtail himself.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Manipulating_the_Triwizard_Tournament">Manipulating the Triwizard Tournament</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>But I am not a man, Muggle. I am much, much more than a man. However...why not? I will face you...Wormtail, come turn my chair around.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort revealing himself to Frank Bryce, before murdering him<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/Voldemortbaby.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20100806083453" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemortbaby" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="230" height="189" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemortbaby.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemortbaby.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/Voldemortbaby.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/230?cb=20100806083453" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/Voldemortbaby.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20100806083453" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemortbaby" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/Voldemortbaby.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/230?cb=20100806083453" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="230" height="189" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemortbaby.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemortbaby.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/Voldemortbaby.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/230?cb=20100806083453" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemortbaby.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort plotting to use Harry Potter to facilitate his return before killing him</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Returning to the <a href="/wiki/Riddle_House" title="Riddle House">Riddle House</a> in <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton" title="Little Hangleton">Little Hangleton</a>, Voldemort set his sights on finally killing Harry Potter. He considered kidnapping Harry during the <a href="/wiki/1994_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="1994 Quidditch World Cup">422nd</a> <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_World_Cup" title="Quidditch World Cup">Quidditch World Cup</a>, where protection from his <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">relatives</a> and Dumbledore would not be so effective, but he was not strong enough to do it with the whole horde of Ministry employees running about, and instead began to concoct a plan to have the boy delivered to him instead, which led to <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Junior" title="Bartemius Crouch Junior">Bartemius Crouch</a>'s infiltration of <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a> under the guise of the far-famed <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a> <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a>, whom he eventually learned that Albus Dumbledore had persuaded to come out of retirement to fill the role of <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> teacher for the <a href="/wiki/1994%E2%80%931995_school_year" title="1994–1995 school year">1994–1995 school year</a>. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Voldemort_kills_Bryce.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190818002156" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort kills Bryce" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort kills Bryce.gif" data-image-key="Voldemort_kills_Bryce.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Voldemort_kills_Bryce.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190818002156" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Voldemort_kills_Bryce.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190818002156" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort kills Bryce" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Voldemort_kills_Bryce.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190818002156" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort kills Bryce.gif" data-image-key="Voldemort_kills_Bryce.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1c/Voldemort_kills_Bryce.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190818002156" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_kills_Bryce.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort murdering Frank Bryce with the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As they were discussing their plans, Voldemort and Wormtail were unaware that a Muggle caretaker of the Riddle House, <a href="/wiki/Frank_Bryce" title="Frank Bryce">Frank Bryce</a>, who had been suspected by the villagers for the murder of the Riddle family for fifty years, had been standing behind the door eavesdropping on their plans. When Nagini arrived in the corridor and spotted him, she informed Voldemort in Parseltongue about his presence. Voldemort invited him into the room and, after a short conversation, killed him for overhearing their plan.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Eve_of_war">Eve of war</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>During the Quidditch World Cup, Barty Crouch Jnr escaped from his father's enchantments and cast the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> but was quickly recaptured again. Voldemort and Wormtail went to the Crouch estate, where Voldemort placed Crouch Snr under the Imperius Curse and freed Crouch Jnr for good.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Voldemort ordered Crouch Jnr and Pettigrew to capture Moody at <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody%27s_house" title="Alastor Moody's house">his home</a>. When they did, Crouch placed Moody under the Imperius Curse and created <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a>, which he used to impersonate Moody for the entire school year. He influenced the Tournament for months, ensuring that Harry would be the one to get to the Triwizard Cup first, which, unbeknownst to anyone, was a <a href="/wiki/Portkey" title="Portkey">Portkey</a>. Meanwhile, Voldemort returned to the Crouch estate with Wormtail, where they ordered Crouch Snr to continue about his business as usual.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>When Crouch Snr started to show signs of resisting the Imperius Curse, Voldemort decided it was no longer safe to allow him to leave the house and instead made him stay home under the presumption of being sick. In late <a href="/wiki/May" title="May">May</a> of <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, Crouch Snr continued to fight through Voldemort's control and eventually escaped due to Wormtail's negligence.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Voldemort quickly alerted Crouch Jnr to stop his father at all costs, as he surmised that Crouch Snr was intending to tell Dumbledore all about his past actions and Voldemort's plans. Upon Crouch Jnr's success, Voldemort spared Pettigrew from being given to Nagini as meat, instead opting to punish him with the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Return_of_the_Dark_Lord">Return of the Dark Lord</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>And then I ask myself, but how could they have believed I would not rise again? They, who knew the steps I took, long ago, to guard myself against mortal death? They, who had seen proofs of the immensity of my power in the times when I was mightier than any wizard living?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort expressing his resentment towards his Death Eaters<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>

<p>On <a href="/wiki/24_June" title="24 June">24 June</a> 1995, Harry, in the spirit of sportsmanship, requested <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> to tie with him for the win. When they both touched the Portkey, they were transported to a <a href="/wiki/Little_Hangleton_graveyard" title="Little Hangleton graveyard">Little Hangleton graveyard</a> where Wormtail and Voldemort were waiting. Under Voldemort's orders, Pettigrew murdered Cedric with the Killing Curse and went on to have Harry tightly bound and gagged to the <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle%27s_Gravestone" title="Tom Riddle's Gravestone">Riddle family tombstone</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
