<p>After Wormtail had placed Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Rudimentary_body_potion" title="Rudimentary body potion">rudimentary body</a> into a cauldron containing the near finished potion, he added the first two ingredients, one of which was his hand, causing it to turn from a poisonous-looking blue to burning red before he proceeded to obtain Harry's blood and added it to the <a href="/wiki/Regeneration_potion" title="Regeneration potion">potion</a> for his master's <a href="/wiki/Return_of_Lord_Voldemort" title="Return of Lord Voldemort">rebirth</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Once the final ingredient was added, the potion turned blinding white, sending out bright sparks as it simmered before dying down and a thick white steam issued from the cauldron: the ritual was now complete. Voldemort regained his physical body, and emerged from the cauldron. Calling on Wormtail to robe him, the reborn Dark Lord took some time examining his body and getting reaccustomed to it. He then called for his servant to show him his arm and used the now activated <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> to summon his Death Eaters.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Summoning_the_Death_Eaters">Summoning the Death Eaters</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>I remember only forcing myself, sleeplessly, endlessly, second by second, to exist. ... I settled in a faraway place, in <a href="/wiki/Black_Forest" title="Black Forest">a forest</a>, and I waited.... Surely, one of my faithful Death Eaters would try and find me... one of them would come and perform the magic I could not, to restore me to a body .. , but I waited in vain. ...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort admonishing his Death Eaters for failing to resurrect him sooner<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Voldemort_and_his_followers.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160809002254" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort and his followers" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort and his followers.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemort_and_his_followers.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Voldemort_and_his_followers.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160809002254" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Voldemort_and_his_followers.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160809002254" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort and his followers" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Voldemort_and_his_followers.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160809002254" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort and his followers.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemort_and_his_followers.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Voldemort_and_his_followers.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160809002254" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_and_his_followers.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort confronting his <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> over their lack of faith in his eventual return</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Those who were perhaps most loyal to him, save for those who willingly went to Azkaban in his name, appeared. Voldemort welcomed them before scorning them for believing him to be dead and informed them that he would expect better of them now that he had returned. 
</p><p>The Dark Lord told the Death Eaters of the events that had led to his first downfall, his years in hiding before he tried to steal the Philosopher's Stone by possessing Quirrell and eventual defeat before finally of how Pettigrew had located him, and they set out to orchestrate his resurrection. He rewarded Wormtail by constructing a silver hand.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Duel_in_Little_Hangleton">Duel in Little Hangleton</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>You have been taught how to duel. Harry Potter? We bow to each other. Harry, Come, the niceties must be observed.... Dumbledore would like you to show manners.... Bow to death, Harry. ... I said, bow, Very good, And now you face me, like a man ... straight-backed and proud, the way your father died....</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort preparing to duel Harry Potter<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Voldemort then set his attention on Harry, and began to mock and humiliate the boy before the Death Eaters. He then had Harry untied so he could force the young wizard into a duel where the Dark Lord had a greater advantage over Harry. When Harry refused to observe the formalities of a wizard's duel, Voldemort used an unspecified spell to force Harry to bow to him. After inflicting the Cruciatus Curse on Harry several times and attempting the Imperius Curse to force Harry to answer his question, which Harry was able to resist doing Voldemort was ready to end the one-sided duel and kill Harry once and for all. Yet as Voldemort cast <i>Avada Kedavra</i>, Harry simultaneously cast <i><a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">Expelliarmus</a></i>, and their <a href="/wiki/Subtle_laws_of_wands#Wand_relation" title="Subtle laws of wands">twin-core wands</a> became locked in <a href="/wiki/Prior_Incantato" title="Prior Incantato"><i>Priori Incantatem</i></a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/28/B4C34M1_Priori_Incantatem_PM.png/revision/latest?cb=20161206050104" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C34M1 Priori Incantatem PM" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C34M1 Priori Incantatem PM.png" data-image-key="B4C34M1_Priori_Incantatem_PM.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/28/B4C34M1_Priori_Incantatem_PM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161206050104" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/28/B4C34M1_Priori_Incantatem_PM.png/revision/latest?cb=20161206050104" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C34M1 Priori Incantatem PM" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/28/B4C34M1_Priori_Incantatem_PM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161206050104" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C34M1 Priori Incantatem PM.png" data-image-key="B4C34M1_Priori_Incantatem_PM.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/28/B4C34M1_Priori_Incantatem_PM.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161206050104" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C34M1_Priori_Incantatem_PM.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort <a href="/wiki/Duel_in_Little_Hangleton" title="Duel in Little Hangleton">duelling</a> Harry in a battle of wills, echoes appearing as a result of <i><a href="/wiki/Prior_Incantato" title="Prior Incantato">Priori Incantatem</a></i></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>People who had been killed by Voldemort's wand came out as spectral visions: First, Diggory, next Bryce, then Jorkins, and followed by Lily and James Potter. They encouraged Harry, while distracting Voldemort. Harry pulled away and had enough time to grab Cedric's body and the Triwizard Cup to return to Hogwarts. This infuriated Voldemort, as he lost his chance at killing Harry right then and there, allowing Harry to alert Dumbledore to Voldemort's return, which created obvious obstacles in his plans to regain his power over the wizarding world.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 
</p><p>Back at Hogwarts, Crouch Jnr was discovered by Dumbledore and Harry but was subjected to the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor's Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a> before he could be put on trial before the Wizengamot.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_33-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Thus, the only knowledge of Voldemort's return was Harry's word, which was vigorously disputed by the Ministry of Magic. Voldemort was able to secretly grow in power,<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> concentrating on recruiting many wizards as well as the giants to his side in addition to stealing the full record of the prophecy regarding himself and Harry.
</p>
<h3><span id="Second_Wizarding_War_.281995.E2.80.931998.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Second_Wizarding_War_(1995–1998)">Second Wizarding War <span class="template-c">(1995–1998)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Bid_for_the_prophecy">Bid for the prophecy</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>You have done well to tell me this. Very well ... I have wasted months on fruitless schemes, it seems.... But no matter ... We begin again, from now. You have Lord Voldemort's gratitude, Rookwood....</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Augustus Rookwood</b>: "<i>My Lord ... yes, My Lord.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>I shall need your help. I shall need all the information you can give me.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Augustus Rookwood</b>: "<i>Of course, My Lord, of course ... anything ...</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Voldemort</b>: "<i>Very well ... you may go. Send <a href="/wiki/Avery_II" title="Avery II">Avery</a> to me.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Voldemort speaking with <a href="/wiki/Augustus_Rookwood" title="Augustus Rookwood">Augustus Rookwood</a> about his desire to steal the prophecy<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>In 1995, Dumbledore reconvened the Order of the Phoenix once more, using Sirius Black's family home at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> as headquarters. Harry, Ron, and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> set up a similar organisation at Hogwarts called <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>, which was originally created to thwart the Ministry's meddling at the school under <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 176px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/Daily_prophet_the_boy_who_lies.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220112144117" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Daily prophet the boy who lies" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="176" height="278" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Daily prophet the boy who lies.jpg" data-image-key="Daily_prophet_the_boy_who_lies.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/Daily_prophet_the_boy_who_lies.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/176?cb=20220112144117" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/Daily_prophet_the_boy_who_lies.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220112144117" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Daily prophet the boy who lies" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/Daily_prophet_the_boy_who_lies.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/176?cb=20220112144117" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="176" height="278" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Daily prophet the boy who lies.jpg" data-image-key="Daily_prophet_the_boy_who_lies.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/eb/Daily_prophet_the_boy_who_lies.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/176?cb=20220112144117" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Daily_prophet_the_boy_who_lies.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> article showing the Ministry trying to libel Harry Potter and anyone who believed him</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Thanks to the Ministry's denial of Voldemort's return and the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a>'s</i> smear campaign against Dumbledore and Harry, the general public was left unaware and ignorant of his presence, making it easy for his operations to run smoothly and without interference. Eventually, Voldemort travelled to Azkaban and freed several of his most loyal Death Eaters, such as <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>. Voldemort had little trouble with this, as many of the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> were happy to obey him. The Dark wizards returned to his side thereafter.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Voldemort's first attempt at securing the prophecy was to have Malfoy put Order member <a href="/wiki/Sturgis_Podmore" title="Sturgis Podmore">Sturgis Podmore</a> under the Imperius Curse and send him to take the prophecy. However, Sturgis was unable to get into the Department of Mysteries.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f1/Azkaban_escape.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190416165532" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Azkaban escape" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Azkaban escape.gif" data-image-key="Azkaban_escape.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f1/Azkaban_escape.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190416165532" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f1/Azkaban_escape.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190416165532" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Azkaban escape" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f1/Azkaban_escape.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190416165532" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Azkaban escape.gif" data-image-key="Azkaban_escape.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f1/Azkaban_escape.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190416165532" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Azkaban_escape.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort breaking Azkaban's gates</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>His next attempt was to use the Imperius Curse on an <a href="/wiki/Unspeakable" title="Unspeakable">Unspeakable</a> named <a href="/wiki/Broderick_Bode" title="Broderick Bode">Broderick Bode</a>. Bode was ordered to retrieve the prophecy but was seriously injured in the process and was put into a permanent ward at <a href="/wiki/St_Mungo%27s_Hospital_for_Magical_Maladies_and_Injuries" title="St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries">St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries</a>. From this, Voldemort learned that the only people who could retrieve a prophecy were the people who were included in the prophecy. Voldemort could not risk going into the Ministry himself, so he used a <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">mental</a> link through Harry's scar to cause him to go there instead.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

<p>Once Harry saw a vision of Sirius trapped in the Department of Mysteries, members of Dumbledore's Army, including Harry, Hermione, Ron, Ginny, Neville, and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a> went there to find him. Though Sirius was never actually there, Harry wound up retrieving the prophecy from its shelf. Death Eaters appeared at once, demanding that Harry hand the prophecy over. Dumbledore's Army fought back, and during the ensuing battle, the prophecy was destroyed. Voldemort was forced to come to the Ministry, but upon learning of its destruction, he attempted to snuff out Harry's life.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

<p>Voldemort's attempt was foiled by Dumbledore, and a <a href="/wiki/Duel_in_the_Ministry_Atrium" title="Duel in the Ministry Atrium">fantastic duel</a> ensued. Despite Voldemort's overwhelming magical abilities, much to his great frustration, Dumbledore quickly gained the upper-hand against the Dark Lord, calmly avoiding and deflecting Voldemort's barrage of attacks while also maintaining the offensive, despite not even fighting to kill. Though he deflected all of Dumbledore's attempts to contain him, and even managed to nearly kill his former teacher, Voldemort was eventually trapped in an orb of water that he was forced to Disapparate out of.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 246px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Harry_Potter_possessed_by_Voldemort_OOTPF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110902075632" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter possessed by Voldemort OOTPF" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="246" height="143" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter possessed by Voldemort OOTPF.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_possessed_by_Voldemort_OOTPF.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Harry_Potter_possessed_by_Voldemort_OOTPF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20110902075632" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Harry_Potter_possessed_by_Voldemort_OOTPF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110902075632" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter possessed by Voldemort OOTPF" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Harry_Potter_possessed_by_Voldemort_OOTPF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20110902075632" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="246" height="143" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter possessed by Voldemort OOTPF.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_possessed_by_Voldemort_OOTPF.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/Harry_Potter_possessed_by_Voldemort_OOTPF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/246?cb=20110902075632" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_possessed_by_Voldemort_OOTPF.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry possessed by Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Voldemort then attempted to possess Harry instead, hoping that Dumbledore would kill the boy in an attempt to destroy Voldemort himself, but Harry's heart, full of grief over the loss of his godfather Sirius, was able to force Voldemort out of his mind. With both the loss of the prophecy and his failure to kill Harry and defeat Dumbledore, Voldemort aborted his mission, dragging Bellatrix along as he fled but not before <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> and the Ministry's other officials arrived, witnessing for themselves that the Dark Lord had, in fact, returned. After a year of operating in secret, Lord Voldemort's cover was now blown and the remaining Death Eaters incapacitated by the Order, including Lucius, were taken into custody and sent to Azkaban.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_31-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Sometime following this, Voldemort would secretly engage in a sexual relationship with Bellatrix Lestrange. Out of this union would be born their daughter <a href="/wiki/Delphini" title="Delphini">Delphini</a>, who would be given over to be raised by the Rowle family, a family sworn to Voldemort.<sup id="cite_ref-34" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="The_start_of_open_war">The start of open war</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>I have been careless, and so have been thwarted by luck and chance, those wreckers of all but the best-laid plans. But I know better now. I understand those things that I did not understand before. I must be the one to kill Harry Potter, and I shall be.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort discussing Harry Potter's triumphs and his own failures<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>

<p>With Voldemort no longer needing to keep his actions silent, the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a> had begun. The Dementors left Azkaban to side with the Dark Lord, who could offer them more scope for their powers. As a result, there were many attacks by Voldemort's army. Mass Muggle killings were rampant; what was claimed to be a hurricane to the Muggle world was in fact a rampage by the <a href="/wiki/Giant" title="Giant">giants</a>, whom Voldemort had drawn into allegiance. Voldemort himself duelled and killed <a href="/wiki/Amelia_Bones" title="Amelia Bones">Amelia Bones</a>, the Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, who was described as having put up a good fight against him and was one of the greatest witches of the age.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Dementor attacks were daily, and the effect on the Muggles manifested in severe depression and grim weather. Voldemort attempted to blackmail <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a>, and when he stood his ground, the Dark Lord initiated the destruction of the <a href="/wiki/Brockdale_Bridge" title="Brockdale Bridge">Brockdale Bridge</a>, sending at least twelve cars into the water.
</p><p>In July 1996, Voldemort required a spy within Hogwarts and inducted Lucius Malfoy's son <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco</a> as a Death Eater. Forced to concede that he could not fight <i>and</i> win against his old teacher, the Dark Lord ordered Draco to kill Dumbledore, for he wished to punish Lucius for his failings by giving his son a task that he could not do. If Draco failed, he would meet terrible consequences. However, Draco was able to sneak a group of Death Eaters into Hogwarts through a pair of Vanishing Cabinets that connected Borgin and Burkes with the Room of Requirement. The <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a> ensued.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Voldemort's plans were carried out when Snape used the Killing Curse on Dumbledore, as Draco himself was unable to bring himself to commit murder despite the threat he was under. Although the Death Eaters fled Hogwarts, the intrusion of the castle signified that there was no longer a single place safe from the Dark Lord.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_17-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-17"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>17<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Meeting_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Meeting at Malfoy Manor">Meeting at Malfoy Manor</a></i></div></dd></dl>

Overjoyed by Dumbledore's demise, Voldemort took over <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a> as his headquarters. During the summer of <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, he captured <a href="/wiki/Charity_Burbage" title="Charity Burbage">Charity Burbage</a>, the Hogwarts Professor of <a href="/wiki/Muggle_Studies" title="Muggle Studies">Muggle Studies</a>, and killed her during a meeting with his Death Eaters before feeding her to <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>. Voldemort also imprisoned and interrogated the kidnapped wandmaker, Garrick Ollivander, about why his wand could not duel against Harry's. </p><figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 249px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/Voldemort_kills_Burbage.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190819223348" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort kills Burbage" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="249" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort kills Burbage.gif" data-image-key="Voldemort_kills_Burbage.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/Voldemort_kills_Burbage.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20190819223348" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/Voldemort_kills_Burbage.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190819223348" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort kills Burbage" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/Voldemort_kills_Burbage.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20190819223348" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="249" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort kills Burbage.gif" data-image-key="Voldemort_kills_Burbage.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/Voldemort_kills_Burbage.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/249?cb=20190819223348" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_kills_Burbage.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort killing Charity Burbage during the meeting held at Malfoy Manor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ollivander revealed that their wands shared the same core and would not work properly against each other. This came as a great relief to Voldemort, who worried that Harry had escaped from him in the graveyard by superior skill. Ollivander told Voldemort that he merely needed another's wand, and so he took Lucius Malfoy's. This served as a way to punish and demean the Malfoy family. At this point, he was nearly ready to conquer the Ministry while insisting that <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a> must be surrounded entirely before he made his next move.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>He felt Voldemort before he saw him. Looking sideways, he stared into the red eyes and was sure they would be the last thing he ever saw: Voldemort preparing to curse him once more — </i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort attempting to murder Harry Potter during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>

<p>On <a href="/wiki/27_July" title="27 July">27 July</a> 1997, when Harry left <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a> for the final time, Voldemort flew to the scene with his Death Eaters to fight the Order of the Phoenix. In the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">ensuing battle</a>, Voldemort murdered Alastor Moody. When he attempted to attack Harry, Harry's wand acted of its own accord, releasing golden fire at him and destroying Malfoy's wand. Before Voldemort could react, Harry reached the protection of the home of <a href="/wiki/Edward_Tonks" title="Edward Tonks">Ted</a> and <a href="/wiki/Andromeda_Tonks" title="Andromeda Tonks">Andromeda Tonks</a>, and Voldemort was forced to retreat.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Voldemort_tortures_Garrick_Ollivander.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190817172458" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort tortures Garrick Ollivander" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort tortures Garrick Ollivander.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemort_tortures_Garrick_Ollivander.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Voldemort_tortures_Garrick_Ollivander.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172458" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Voldemort_tortures_Garrick_Ollivander.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190817172458" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort tortures Garrick Ollivander" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Voldemort_tortures_Garrick_Ollivander.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172458" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort tortures Garrick Ollivander.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemort_tortures_Garrick_Ollivander.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/08/Voldemort_tortures_Garrick_Ollivander.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172458" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_tortures_Garrick_Ollivander.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort torturing Ollivander</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Voldemort returned to his headquarters at Malfoy Manor, and accompanied by Peter Pettigrew, accused Ollivander of deliberately misleading him and tortured him with the Cruciatus Curse. Ollivander told him truthfully that never in wandlore had he ever heard of such a thing happening between two wands. Voldemort ordered Ollivander to tell him everything he knew about the legendary wand known as the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ministry_take-over">Ministry take-over</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Fall_of_the_Ministry_of_Magic" class="mw-redirect" title="Fall of the Ministry of Magic">Fall of the Ministry of Magic</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>The Ministry has fallen. Scrimgeour is dead. They are coming.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Kingsley Shacklebolt warning the Order of the Phoenix<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Fallen_Ministry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150816122355" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Fallen Ministry" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Fallen Ministry.jpg" data-image-key="Fallen_Ministry.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Fallen_Ministry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150816122355" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Fallen_Ministry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150816122355" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Fallen Ministry" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Fallen_Ministry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150816122355" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Fallen Ministry.jpg" data-image-key="Fallen_Ministry.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Fallen_Ministry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150816122355" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Fallen_Ministry.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The officials and the <a href="/wiki/Pius_Thicknesse" title="Pius Thicknesse">puppet minister</a> that Voldemort installed to run the Ministry and enforce the new regime</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Shortly after this, the Ministry of Magic was compromised and fell to the power of Voldemort when Minister <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a> was tortured for information and murdered, with the official version being that he retired. News of this came to the Order of the Phoenix during the wedding of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a> at the Burrow due to <a href="/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt" title="Kingsley Shacklebolt">Kingsley Shacklebolt</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a>.
</p><p>Voldemort established a totalitarian police state with <a href="/wiki/Pius_Thicknesse" title="Pius Thicknesse">Pius Thicknesse</a>, under the Imperius Curse, serving as a puppet Minister for Magic and Death Eater <a href="/wiki/Corban_Yaxley" title="Corban Yaxley">Corban Yaxley</a> as the Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement. The <a href="/wiki/Muggle-Born_Registration_Commission" title="Muggle-Born Registration Commission">Muggle-Born Registration Commission</a> was created to round up Muggle-borns and imprison them in Azkaban. Harry Potter was declared <a href="/wiki/Undesirable" title="Undesirable">Undesirable</a> No. 1 with a reward on his head, on the basis that he was wanted for questioning over the death of Dumbledore. Meanwhile, Severus Snape took over as Headmaster of Hogwarts while Death Eater siblings <a href="/wiki/Amycus_Carrow" title="Amycus Carrow">Amycus Carrow</a> and <a href="/wiki/Alecto_Carrow" title="Alecto Carrow">Alecto Carrow</a> became teachers.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Voldemort placed a <a href="/wiki/Taboo" title="Taboo">Taboo</a> on his name which enabled his <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> to instantly locate anyone who spoke it out loud in the open. Voldemort chose not to publicly declare himself Minister of Magic in order to maintain an atmosphere of fear and uncertainty.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="The_search_for_the_Elder_Wand">The search for the Elder Wand</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Mission_For_The_Elder_Wand" class="mw-redirect" title="Mission For The Elder Wand">Mission For The Elder Wand</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Kill me then, Voldemort!... That wand will never, ever be yours!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Grindelwald confronting Voldemort in Nurmengard<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Voldemort_killing_Gregorovitch.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20190817172720" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort killing Gregorovitch" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort killing Gregorovitch.JPG" data-image-key="Voldemort_killing_Gregorovitch.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Voldemort_killing_Gregorovitch.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172720" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Voldemort_killing_Gregorovitch.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20190817172720" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort killing Gregorovitch" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Voldemort_killing_Gregorovitch.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172720" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort killing Gregorovitch.JPG" data-image-key="Voldemort_killing_Gregorovitch.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a7/Voldemort_killing_Gregorovitch.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172720" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_killing_Gregorovitch.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort interrogating Gregorovitch, seconds before killing him</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>With his servants taking care of business in Britain, Voldemort left Great Britain to seek out the acclaimed wandmaker <a href="/wiki/Mykew_Gregorovitch" title="Mykew Gregorovitch">Mykew Gregorovitch</a> and obtain the <a href="/wiki/Elder_Wand" title="Elder Wand">Elder Wand</a>. Eventually, after murdering several people who got in his way, Voldemort found him, but was informed that the wand had been stolen. Voldemort performed Legilimency on Gregorovitch and saw the memory of a young blond boy who stole the wand. Voldemort demanded to know the identity of the thief, but when Gregorovitch did not know it, Voldemort killed him.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Voldemort_and_Grindelwald_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190817172422" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort and Grindelwald DHF1" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort and Grindelwald DHF1.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemort_and_Grindelwald_DHF1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Voldemort_and_Grindelwald_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172422" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Voldemort_and_Grindelwald_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190817172422" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort and Grindelwald DHF1" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Voldemort_and_Grindelwald_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172422" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort and Grindelwald DHF1.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemort_and_Grindelwald_DHF1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Voldemort_and_Grindelwald_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190817172422" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort_and_Grindelwald_DHF1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort interrogating Grindelwald, seconds before killing him</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/24_December" title="24 December">Christmas Eve</a> of <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, Nagini summoned Voldemort to <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric's Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>, where Harry and Hermione Granger were visiting the graves of Harry's parents and investigating the possibility that <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a> might have the Sword of Gryffindor. Harry and Hermione narrowly managed to escape just as he arrived. However, Voldemort found a picture of the aforementioned blond boy at Bagshot's home; this boy turned out to be none other than Dark wizard <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a>, whom Dumbledore had defeated in 1945.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/DH1_Voldemort_testing_the_Elder_Wand.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190207203409" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 Voldemort testing the Elder Wand" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DH1 Voldemort testing the Elder Wand.gif" data-image-key="DH1_Voldemort_testing_the_Elder_Wand.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/DH1_Voldemort_testing_the_Elder_Wand.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190207203409" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/DH1_Voldemort_testing_the_Elder_Wand.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190207203409" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 Voldemort testing the Elder Wand" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/DH1_Voldemort_testing_the_Elder_Wand.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190207203409" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DH1 Voldemort testing the Elder Wand.gif" data-image-key="DH1_Voldemort_testing_the_Elder_Wand.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/DH1_Voldemort_testing_the_Elder_Wand.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190207203409" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH1_Voldemort_testing_the_Elder_Wand.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort <a href="/wiki/Lightning_spell" title="Lightning spell">testing</a> the Elder Wand's power after removing it from Dumbledore's tomb</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In <a href="/wiki/March" title="March">March</a> of <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, Voldemort travelled to <a href="/wiki/Austria" title="Austria">Austria</a> and broke into <a href="/wiki/Nurmengard_Castle" title="Nurmengard Castle">Nurmengard</a> prison, where Grindelwald was being held, and demanded to know the location of the Elder Wand. Grindelwald baffled Voldemort by being completely unafraid of him and saying that he welcomed death. Voldemort then murdered him in a rage without gaining any information.
</p><p>At that moment, <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> summoned him by pressing the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a>. Harry Potter had accidentally broken the Taboo an hour prior, and he and his friends, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>, were captured by a group of <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a> led by <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a> and were brought to <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a>. He departed Austria to end Harry's life, but just before he could arrive, they managed to escape with the assistance of <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a> <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>. The arriving Voldemort caused physical harm for Bellatrix and the Malfoys and forbade them to leave the manor as punishment.
</p><p>Shortly after this, Voldemort deduced that Dumbledore, who had defeated Grindelwald, had won the Elder Wand. Voldemort then went to Hogwarts, where he met with Snape and proceeded to break into Dumbledore's tomb and thus stole the Elder Wand.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Learning_of_the_Horcrux_hunt">Learning of the <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" class="mw-redirect" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter's Horcrux Hunt">Horcrux hunt</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Say it again! Say it again! Impostors? What impostors? I thought Gringotts had <a href="/wiki/Thief%27s_Downfall" title="Thief's Downfall">ways</a> of revealing impostors? Who were they? And they took? Tell me! </i>What did they take<i>?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort interrogating a Gringotts Goblin, becoming aware of Harry's Horcrux hunt<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/51/The_Killing_Curse.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120715135203" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The Killing Curse" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="The Killing Curse.gif" data-image-key="The_Killing_Curse.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/51/The_Killing_Curse.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120715135203" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/51/The_Killing_Curse.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120715135203" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The Killing Curse" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/51/The_Killing_Curse.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120715135203" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="The Killing Curse.gif" data-image-key="The_Killing_Curse.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/51/The_Killing_Curse.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120715135203" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_Killing_Curse.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort, upon learning that one of his <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff's Cup">Hufflepuff's Cup</a>, was stolen, kills the bearers of bad news in a fit of rage</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/1_May" title="1 May">1 May</a> <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, Voldemort was informed by several goblins from Gringotts that Harry Potter and his friends, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger, had robbed the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_vault" class="mw-redirect" title="Lestrange vault">Lestrange vault</a>. This caused Voldemort to panic, and when he was informed that <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff's Cup">a small golden cup</a> had been stolen, he flew into a rage. Voldemort <a href="/wiki/Massacre_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Massacre at Malfoy Manor">massacred</a> all those who told him the news, having realised at that moment that Harry was hunting his Horcruxes. However, he could not figure out how the boy had discovered his secret when he never told anyone.
</p><p>In truth, Dumbledore and Harry had discovered, from studying Voldemort's past, that he had created Horcruxes, and also what they were and where they were hidden. Dumbledore first theorised about the Horcruxes and then passed the knowledge onto Harry; from there, Harry was able to complete the hunt. Voldemort listed all the locations of his Horcruxes in his mind, unaware that Harry was connected to his mind at the time. He unwittingly revealed that his last Horcrux was at Hogwarts, just as Harry previously suspected. This caused Harry, Ron, and Hermione to venture back to Hogwarts.
</p><p>Following these revelations, Voldemort went to check out the Gaunt Shack and the Cave, only to discover to his fury that the Horcruxes stored there were missing and thus were likely destroyed.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>I know that you are preparing to fight. Your efforts are futile. You cannot fight me. I do not want to kill you. Give me Harry Potter, and you will be rewarded. You have until midnight.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort's ultimatum before the final battle began<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>

<p>Voldemort then returned to Hogwarts, where the residents had already ousted the Death Eaters teaching there and had begun preparing a defence against him. Voldemort rounded up his entire army of Death Eaters, Snatchers, Werewolves, Giants, and Dementors, and commanded his army to fight the Order of the Phoenix members, professors, and students who were in the castle: the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> ensued. 
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Murder_of_Severus_Snape" title="Murder of Severus Snape">Murder of Severus Snape</a></i></div></dd></dl>

<p>Voldemort himself was not present at the opening stage of the battle, as he was staying within the <a href="/wiki/Shrieking_Shack" title="Shrieking Shack">Shrieking Shack</a>, feeling there was no need for him to fight at the time. While in the shack, he investigated why the Elder Wand did not work any differently from his old wand. He came to the conclusion that it needed to accept him as a master and ordered Nagini to kill Snape. He believed this would solve the problem by transferring mastery of the wand to himself, assuming that since Snape killed Dumbledore, then he was the current master of the wand.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> It is unknown why Voldemort did not attempt to find Sybill Trelawney during this time, though it is possible that since Voldemort believed himself to be the Master of the Elder Wand, he believed that any prophecy concerning him and Harry would be rendered irrelevant due to his enhanced power, of which he was ultimately wrong.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry's sacrifice" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry's sacrifice.gif" data-image-key="Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry's sacrifice" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry's sacrifice.gif" data-image-key="Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140616170544" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry%27s_sacrifice.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry willingly letting Voldemort hit him with the <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Voldemort then called a one-hour armistice, requesting Harry in exchange for peace and no further deaths. Unbeknownst to Voldemort, Harry carried within him the seventh Horcrux: the scar on his forehead, which was formed when Voldemort failed to kill him as an infant. When Harry met Voldemort in the Forbidden Forest, Voldemort used the Killing Curse on him almost immediately, but only destroyed the Horcrux, rendering his scar 'normal'. 
</p><p>What was not revealed to Voldemort was that when he used Harry's blood three years prior in order to gain himself a new body, the blood passed Harry's mother's protection to Voldemort and anchored Harry to the living world through the Dark Lord. Both Harry and Voldemort temporarily fell unconscious, and Voldemort's maimed soul appeared in <a href="/wiki/Limbo" title="Limbo">limbo</a> where Harry spoke to Dumbledore.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="His_last_stand"><a href="/wiki/Voldemort%27s_Last_Stand" title="Voldemort's Last Stand">His last stand</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>You see? Harry Potter is dead! Do you understand now, deluded ones? He was nothing, ever, but a boy who relied on others to sacrifice themselves for him!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort rejoicing over Harry Potter's 'death'<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Unsure of what had just happened, Voldemort ordered <a href="/wiki/Narcissa_Malfoy" title="Narcissa Malfoy">Narcissa Malfoy</a> to check Harry's body. Narcissa did so and pronounced Harry dead, eliciting celebration from the Death Eaters. Voldemort then declared that no man could threaten him anymore. He degraded Harry's body by performing the Cruciatus Curse, then forced the captured Hagrid to carry it back to Hogwarts for all to see. Voldemort did not realise, however, that Narcissa had lied to him in order to enter the castle so as to find her son.
</p><p>As Voldemort and his army marched to Hogwarts, Voldemort claimed that Harry had been killed while trying to escape. Instead of surrendering, Neville charged at Voldemort. After Neville refused to join him, Voldemort placed a <a href="/wiki/Full_Body-Bind_Curse" title="Full Body-Bind Curse">Full Body-Bind Curse</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> on him and set the hat on fire to make an example of him, claiming that Slytherin would be the only Hogwarts House from then on. But at that moment, reinforcements for the Hogwarts defenders arrived. Neville was able to throw off the curse and pulled Gryffindor's Sword from the Hat, and used it to decapitate Nagini, destroying the last remaining Horcrux. Enraged, Voldemort attempted to kill Neville, but Harry, now beneath his <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility cloak</a>, interfered and cast a Shield Charm between them.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/43/Deathly_Hallows_-_Voldemort_Protego.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120112180806" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Deathly Hallows - Voldemort Protego" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Deathly Hallows - Voldemort Protego.gif" data-image-key="Deathly_Hallows_-_Voldemort_Protego.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/43/Deathly_Hallows_-_Voldemort_Protego.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120112180806" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/43/Deathly_Hallows_-_Voldemort_Protego.gif/revision/latest?cb=20120112180806" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Deathly Hallows - Voldemort Protego" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/43/Deathly_Hallows_-_Voldemort_Protego.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120112180806" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Deathly Hallows - Voldemort Protego.gif" data-image-key="Deathly_Hallows_-_Voldemort_Protego.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/43/Deathly_Hallows_-_Voldemort_Protego.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20120112180806" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Deathly_Hallows_-_Voldemort_Protego.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort forcing himself into Hogwarts</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the second round of the Battle of Hogwarts, Voldemort tried to strike down everyone within his reach and his weakened army forced its way into the castle. In the <a href="/wiki/Great_Hall" title="Great Hall">Great Hall</a>, his army was gradually cut down as Voldemort fought Slughorn, Shacklebolt, and <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a> all at once, and later blasted them away. When Bellatrix Lestrange was killed by <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a>, Voldemort turned his wand on her in rage. At that time, Harry cast a Shield Charm to protect her, and revealed himself to be very much alive. The two wizards then faced each other in the Great Hall.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Receiving_his_comeuppance">Receiving his comeuppance</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>But what does it matter? Even if you are right, Potter, it makes no difference to you and me. You no longer have the phoenix wand: We duel on skill alone ... and after I have killed you, I can attend to Draco Malfoy....</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Voldemort threatening Harry in his final moments<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Here, Harry mentioned that by willingly sacrificing himself to Voldemort, he had protected everyone he cared about in Hogwarts with the same magic his mother created when she died for him. Harry tried to explain to Voldemort that he had magic Voldemort did not have and a weapon more powerful than his, in addition to warning Voldemort of the fate that lay in store for him if he was unwilling to feel remorse for his actions. Goading him by using his birth name, Harry told him that Snape's loyalty was with Dumbledore all along, that Dumbledore's death was planned, and that Snape had not been the master of the Elder Wand; Draco had been.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_27-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-27"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>27<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest?cb=20150904231059" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished.png" data-image-key="B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest?cb=20150904231059" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished.png" data-image-key="B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The final duel between <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> and Lord Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Originally shocked, Voldemort remained unworried because Harry did not have his original wand, and he told Harry he would kill him and then dispose of Draco to gain full mastery of the Elder Wand. But Harry revealed that he had <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">already disarmed Draco</a>, so the Elder Wand was now rightfully his. Refusing to believe this, Voldemort fired a Killing Curse at Harry, while Harry countered with his 'trademark' spell of <i>Expelliarmus</i>. The Elder Wand refused to kill its true master, and Voldemort's spell rebounded off Harry's, killing the Dark Lord once and for all. 
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Legacy">Legacy</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Post-mortem">Post-mortem</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Professor, what is that?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Albus Dumbledore</b>: "<i>Something that is beyond either of our help.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Description of Voldemort's ruined soul<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Voldemort%27s_mutilated_soul.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811144243" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort's mutilated soul" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="251" height="105" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Voldemort's mutilated soul.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemort%27s_mutilated_soul.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Voldemort%27s_mutilated_soul.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180811144243" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Voldemort%27s_mutilated_soul.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811144243" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Voldemort's mutilated soul" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Voldemort%27s_mutilated_soul.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180811144243" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="251" height="105" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Voldemort's mutilated soul.jpg" data-image-key="Voldemort%27s_mutilated_soul.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f9/Voldemort%27s_mutilated_soul.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20180811144243" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Voldemort%27s_mutilated_soul.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Voldemort's mangled soul in limbo for eternity</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After his death, Voldemort's body was moved to a <a href="/wiki/Resting_Chamber_of_Lord_Voldemort" class="mw-redirect" title="Resting Chamber of Lord Voldemort">separate chamber away from the Great Hall</a>. What happened to it afterwards remains unknown, but it can be assumed that it was disposed of. Meanwhile, his mutilated soul was trapped in <a href="/wiki/Limbo" title="Limbo">limbo</a> for eternity, as the soul is meant to stay whole and intact for a proper afterlife. Because of the destruction done to his soul, he was unable to move on or return to the land of the living as a ghost.<sup id="cite_ref-bloom_35-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-bloom-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> After his confirmed death, the wizarding world at large seemed to be able to speak his name without any more fear. In the end, Lord Voldemort, who feared death above all, suffered a much more horrific fate.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Return_to_peace">Return to peace</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>The death of Lord Voldemort changed the lives of hundreds of thousands of witches and wizards for the better, and Harry Potter was held in high esteem for removing a great number of complications from many peoples' lives. However, his bloody campaign had left a great deal of damage that would not soon be repaired. Following the restoration of the original timeline, Delphini would attempt to go back in time to the night where Voldemort went after the Potters in Godric's Hollow and prevent him from doing so, hoping to ensure that Voldemort was never defeated. Harry and Albus Potter, Draco and Scorpius Malfoy, Ginny, Ron, and Hermione would then go back to try to stop her. 
</p><p>During this attempt, the group tried to catch her off guard by making Harry disguise himself as Voldemort. While he was eventually discovered, the group was nonetheless able to prevent Delphini's plan from succeeding and captured her. However, before they left back into their own time, both Harry and Delphini were forced to witness Voldemort's attack at Godric's Hollow, resulting in Harry witnessing his parents' deaths and Delphini seeing her father's first defeat.<sup id="cite_ref-36" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>During the <a href="/wiki/Calamity" title="Calamity">Calamity</a>, which occurred during the <a href="/wiki/2010s" title="2010s">2010s</a>, a <a href="/wiki/Portrait" title="Portrait">portrait</a> of Riddle became one of many things that became <a href="/wiki/Foundable" title="Foundable">Foundables</a>, magical artefacts which appeared throughout the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a> without explanation. A memory of a young Riddle also manifested in the world as a Foundable. A series of other portraits of Riddle were also "found" in a back room at <a href="/wiki/Borgin_and_Burkes" title="Borgin and Burkes">Borgin and Burkes</a> by Junior <a href="/wiki/Unspeakable" title="Unspeakable">Unspeakable</a> <a href="/wiki/Regina_Rowle" title="Regina Rowle">Regina Rowle</a>, who asked a <a href="/wiki/Calamity_Investigator" title="Calamity Investigator">Calamity Investigator</a> working for the <a href="/wiki/Statute_of_Secrecy_Task_Force" title="Statute of Secrecy Task Force">Statute of Secrecy Task Force</a> to transport them to safety, forcing them to undergo a thoroughly uncomfortable conversation with one of the portraits.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_37-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU-37"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>37<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Alternate_timeline">Alternate timeline</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>More than twenty years following his death, Voldemort's daughter Delphini would attempt to rewrite the timeline in order to bring her father back. Though she would ultimately fail, one of the attempts by <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Potter</a> and <a href="/wiki/Scorpius_Malfoy" title="Scorpius Malfoy">Scorpius Malfoy</a> to change the timeline and save Cedric and prevent his death (unknowingly to them orchestrated by Delphini herself), would result in a temporary timeline where Cedric never died and where Voldemort succeeded in killing Harry at the Battle of Hogwarts. This alternate timeline where Voldemort both lived and won the Wizarding War would eventually be prevented and changed back into the original timeline through the efforts of Scorpius and the alternate timeline's versions of Snape, Hermione, and Ron.<sup id="cite_ref-38" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-38"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>38<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Physical_description">Physical description</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>The thin man stepped out of the cauldron, staring at Harry...and Harry stared back into the face that had haunted his nightmares for three years. Whiter than a skull, with wide, livid scarlet eyes and a nose that was flat as a <a href="/wiki/Snake" title="Snake">snake</a>'s but with slits for nostrils....</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Description of Voldemort after his <a href="/wiki/Return_of_Lord_Voldemort" title="Return of Lord Voldemort">rebirth</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 200px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bb/Tom_Riddle_Half-Blood_Prince_Profile.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090604141342" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom Riddle Half-Blood Prince Profile" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="321" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Tom Riddle Half-Blood Prince Profile.jpg" data-image-key="Tom_Riddle_Half-Blood_Prince_Profile.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bb/Tom_Riddle_Half-Blood_Prince_Profile.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20090604141342" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bb/Tom_Riddle_Half-Blood_Prince_Profile.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090604141342" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tom Riddle Half-Blood Prince Profile" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bb/Tom_Riddle_Half-Blood_Prince_Profile.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20090604141342" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="321" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Tom Riddle Half-Blood Prince Profile.jpg" data-image-key="Tom_Riddle_Half-Blood_Prince_Profile.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bb/Tom_Riddle_Half-Blood_Prince_Profile.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20090604141342" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tom_Riddle_Half-Blood_Prince_Profile.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Tom Riddle in his youth</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During his childhood and early adulthood, Tom Marvolo Riddle was tall and extremely handsome, with pale skin, jet black hair, and dark eyes.
